descriptionHTML:
Er du træt af de gammeldags brugergrænseflader i ordlege?
Har du lyst til at opleve en ordleg på en helt ny måde?
★★★ Nu kan du downloade Ord Kryds og spille GRATIS på BRÆT! ★★★
 
Ord Kryds er en kreativ ordleg som udfordrer din hjerne. Spillet har alt hvad en ordleg skal have og er fuldstændigt VANEDANNENDE & UNDERHOLDENDE.
 
➤ Nyt & Friskt Look: Hvis du kan lide at spille brætspil og puslespil, vil du elske den rene og friske BRÆT-GRÆNSEFLADE ved første øjekast.
 
➤ Praktisk & Nemt at Spille: Du kan let swipe bogstaverne for at danne et specifikt skjult ord. Det er nemt at spille og sjovt at mestre for alle. 

➤ Overraskende Bonus: Log ind hver dag og få daglig bonus. Optjen mønter når du har fundet de Ekstra Ord, som ikke findes på brættet.

➤ Over 3.000 Spændende Udfordringer: Det er nemt i begyndelsen og bliver hurtigt udfordrende. Test hvor mange ord du kender. Flere baner er på vej.

➤ 100% Vanedannende Ordleg: Du vil aldrig opleve et kedeligt øjeblik! Spil dette krydsordsspil én gang og du vil ikke kunne lægge det fra dig!
 

☆ HVORDAN MAN SPILLER ☆

- Swipe bogstaverne, sæt dem i række og fyld de blanke felter lodret og vandret på brættet
- Tryk på knappen “Bland” for at ændre rækkefølgen af bogstaver
- Tryk på knappen “Tips” for at få hjælp


★ FUNKTIONER ★

• Flot & Rent BRÆT til dig (Følg med for personliggjorte designs)
• Find ekstra ord for at indsamle mønter
• 3000+ BANER som du kan spille
• GRATIS at få Daglig Bonus mønter
• Passende for både børn og voksne til at træne ordsøgningsevner
• Ingen netværksforbindelse påkrævet og du kan nyde ordsøgning når som helst
• Enkelt og nemt at spille, udfordrende gameplay
• Helt GRATIS for alle spillere
 

DOWNLOAD nu, træn din hjerne og bliv en ægte mester i ordleg på BRÆT!

★ KONTAKT ★

comments: I'll get the negative part done 1st. I'd give this 5 stars if there weren't so many ads!!! For the amount of time you actually get a turn, 30 seconds ads in between every turn is a bit much.  Outside of that this is a very fun addictive game.  Note to new players. Although the ball travels better with a perfect hit, there are too many obstacles if you got straight down the middle. Better to hit just left or right of all that.

Needs way more bats i beat this in 3 days and can't get the ball any farther. Add more bats and I'll give 5 stars.  Update: need to make the bats harder to get i already had all the new ones unlocked when i opened the app after the update. Litterally took one swing with the now highest bat and now there is no point to play.  You should make it like 5,000 km for the next update or something.

I think this game is GREAT and pretty fun but there is some things that I don't like about this game for example THERE IS TO MUCH ADS!!!! not just that but also when you do it perfect it goes straight right??? Well hitting perfect actually sucks because if you go to the middle EVERYTHING is in your way I'd rather hit it on the left or right.

Need improvements! First of all, when you will make a perfect hit the chances are 99% that you will hit an obstacle. Secondly, there is no sound.Developers put different sound modes/effects based on the tipe of the bat and some background music! Finally, I think that the game is good and addictive but it needs improvements! üëç‚öæÔ∏èüèè

It's a very simple game, kind of has potential but not a whole lot. There's way too many ads, it feels more like an advertisement trap than a game at times. The ads pop up at inconvenient times and interfere with gameplay. If you have absolutely nothing better to do, then install. If you have literally anything else to do, it's a waste of time

It's fun. But an ad after every attempt is rediculous. I get the developer wants to make money but when you can't play the game without a 30 second ad after every attempt it makes it hard to play. Playing in airplane mode gets rid of the ads and it's fun to play that way. Reduce the number of ads and this game will be better.

comments: Better game than the other similar. I know the other game was first, but they want you to pay hundreds of dollars upfront so you start at similar pace as this one. Or wait long time, and span of that game is years! Whilst this game is fast to start, cheap, and at free play you can beat it in months, while if you spend a couple of bucks, you can beat it in days, at the most weeks. So basically they sell out this genre for a few bucks, and good riddance! It was fun for a few days, spend few bucks to beat it in few more days, or wait a bit. And thats that. It is, how it is suppose to be.

Tap your screen. Wait. Tap some more. Wait. Watch some ads and hope they don't freeze for a minute. More waiting. You're going to delete it eventually, just don't bother.  Reply: If real life were as banal and buggy as this game, I would have drunk a bleach smoothie by now.

Was fine until the event will no longer load and keeps telling me there's an issue, asking me to send an email and reload... which doesnt fix anything... just repeats the process... so guess another game being uninstalled cuz it doesn't work right smh

I love who you added as the workers! I not good with comics or super heros but i think thats stanley? And i love how you added chef Gordon Ramsay! If you update this game i have 1 question, can the tech manager of the second floor be steve jobs?

EDITED REVIEW(new review first): game itself is pretty cool. There's nice bonus gifts that help get the game moving. Artwork is great. That ad with the voice over didnt do this game justice. Game gets 3 stars, ad gets 1. (ORIGINAL REVIEW) Saw an ad for this and must say it was awkward as heck. The voice over didnt seem like a real person or was too nervous to smoothly say the lines. Left an ill impression of the game at first glance. And while it did get my attention as ads are supposed to do, it's not a positive one.

Good game, but they're some bugs that need sorting out. At random times the game just cuts off, sometimes when you are loading up the game it say ooops something went wrong write an email, Evan some of the videos freeze up or just shuts everything down. I would be happy if I could play the game without any problems at all. Thank you for your time and patients. Have a good day.

descriptionHTML:
Cash is the name of the game in Cash, Inc. the ultimate cash clicker game! Tap your way to fame and fortune and you’ll become the most popular billionaire in this business adventure!

This tapping game was made for you, boss. Make money by tapping your way to the upper echelon. Tap to build one business, two businesses, three, and so much more! After all, a business tycoon has to start somewhere.

Click and tap all day and then let rich superstars take your biz to the next level! Become a money-crazed business tycoon as you see your riches grow.

The rich life lets you accumulate millions and billions of dollars while your workers do all the work for you. The adventure to fame starts now!

Cash, Inc. Features:

IDLE CLICKER THAT MAKES YOU RICH
• Tap, tap, tap and get rich while barely lifting a finger!
• Click and then rest. Profit from your businesses without actually being there!
• Tapping will make you a fortune. Use your earnings to invest in various businesses and then sell them to win the public’s sympathy!
• Make money and pile up profit so you can spend your money on what YOU want.

BUSINESS TYCOON AMENITIES:

• Hire celebrities and make more money while enjoying your fame!

SHARE YOUR WEALTH
• Make it rain money and brag about your riches on social media!
• Be a money machine and compare what you own against other business tycoons around the world.

Tap to keep your cash flow healthy and thriving as you continue building your business, fortune and reputation. Get famous and become the most successful business tycoon in this idle clicker game. Watch as the rich and famous fight for your favor in Cash, Inc.!

Download now to start your own business adventure to fame and fortune!

comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

Im not normally one for puzzle games but This game is great and addictive, haven't played a game quite like it. This game was done so well from the gameplay to graphics to controls, it is a really fluid experience and a great puzzle game, the new mechanics were introduced perfectly as I progressed and there was never a puzzle too easy or hard the level of difficulty increases and a good rate! Way To Go guys

This is a phenomenal puzzle game. It provides you with an incredibly simple concept that eases the player into the game's mechanics and turns into some very devious puzzles later on. The ads are a bit intrusive, being the ones you could accidentally tap on trying to remove with larger hands (like mine), and unskippable video ads that reward you with in-game currency needed to unlock levels, but those are never necessary, and for less than 2 dollars you can remove them outright. All in all, this is a charming and brain-teasing puzzle game that's well worth your time.

The first levels are okay but after that there's a huge difficulty gap, got really frustrating. Controls are really bad. How I'm supposed to know where I'm taking the truck if my finger is on top of it?

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)
description: RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive! You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.This is how you do it:1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.2) Press play.3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!Features:* 400 FREE levels* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans* Beautiful graphics* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effectsThe game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!‚òÖ‚òÖ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ‚òÖ‚òÖAvailable In-App purchases: KING TRUCK* The premium version of RGB Express* Removes ads* Supports game development and future updatesHINTS* The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.Please note:* Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video* TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.

This is how you do it:
1) Draw routes for your truck drivers. Make sure that every house receives the correct package.
2) Press play.
3) Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!

Features:
* 400 FREE levels
* Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
* Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
* Beautiful graphics
* Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!

★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★

Available In-App purchases:

KING TRUCK
* The premium version of RGB Express
* Removes ads
* Supports game development and future updates

HINTS
* The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
* Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
* TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

I completely love this game and I would play it again. But I got one problem that one will help me reinstall my Google Play Store. My phone was reset to the factory state. And now there is something wrong with my Google Play Store. And no one will help me reinstall it I have asked for help on several occasions through Google but no reply

It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.

The scene at the end of the level is annoying and takes 5 seconds to play out. Then you have to wait for it to load back to show your stars getting in your chest and your coins. It would be better if it just proceeded to the next level saving about 30 seconds. All that to say, it's an addicting game.

Oh my gosh, this game is so much fun! I have a dentist appointment coming up, so I got this game to settle my nerves. I'm having such a good time playing, I know this will be just the thing to help me out! üòÄ Thank you üòÑ

descriptionHTML:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds!

● Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world!
● Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing!
● Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
● Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

comments: I hope you take the time to read.   This game is amazing, and it just keeps getting better. I do wish you would change the video knives to apples or video. Now I have nothing to spend apples on.  But here is what i really wanted to say i really like this company and the games you put out to your users. I'm newly paralyzed and I been well adapting to my new life and because my hands dont work like they used to these games kept my mind busy and has helped me. I own alot of your games and have spent alot trying to help. I wish I had more to unlock things in time. But Thank you very much.

Ads interrupt gameplay and are extremely aggravating. The video that you have to watch to continue your gameplay never works. The game crashes when xp increases. I personally dislike this game, and it would be better if these issues were resolved. Thank you for taking time out of your day to read this review.

Deleted all my data with no reason. Had a bunch of Legendaries and Rares that have now been deleted. I put a lot of time into this game, and even bought the ad-free package. If you don't want a load of wasted time, don't download this app.  Edit- Updated the app and levelled up a bit. The game crashes every time I get a free revive. Still a massive waste of time.

The game sucks it's alwful. It's gliching non stop for your bad. There are ADS everywhere! Ketchapp you getting worse and worse. There are ads of stupid games everywhere. What a game maker will pay to another game to show them in ADS! That makes the game in the ad even worse. Please ketchapp I was a big fan of you but you made your games so STUPIT. PLEASE FIX YOUR GAMES!

The game was amazing! There was only 1 problem. Sometimes when i  started a game in the middle of it, it would just show an ad and it would make me lose. Unless you fix this my rating will be 4 stars. Fix this and the rate will be 5 stars

I really do like the game. There are two things that get to me however. Knives should all have individual names other than the boss ones. There are also alot of ads, I do understand they need to make üí∞. Otherwise the game is great.

description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you‚Äôre not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!üí∏RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!üí∏LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!üí∏GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!üí∏COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don‚Äôt miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder‚Äôs career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you‚Äôll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they‚Äôll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home! The game features:‚óè Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!‚óè Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.‚óè Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!‚óè A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!‚óè Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.‚óè A cute pet: meet –∞ naughty and fluffy cat.‚óè Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house! descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!

Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com
developerAddress: The Digital Hub, Dublin 8, Ireland
recentChanges: Enjoy a new Homescapes update!
FLYING HIGH TOURNAMENT
‚Ä¢ Make paper planes to finish in the top and win valuable pieces
‚Ä¢ Get to know a new character: Jerry Doyle, a tournament planner
ALSO FEATURING
‚Ä¢ A new element: Ice Bomb. Deactivate it before it freezes the adjacent tiles
‚Ä¢ A new part of the storyline: create your dream garage and fix a retro car
‚Ä¢ And many other improvements
summary: Homescapes
title: Homescapes

The concept is great but it needs an update especially when dropping the blocks as it becomes unstable after a while of building it up even if each row of blocks are level. Would make the game better if fixed.
This game itself is really fun and I like it, but it has way too many ads. There's is an ad every tinge you lose and sometimes just randomly. On top of that, its the same ad every time.
I think the concept is great. But i only rated it one star, because it wont even let me play. As soon as i open the app, i get a black screen.

descriptionHTML:
Love puzzle games, but want something a bit more creative? Then look no further! Play fun puzzle games on Paint Tower!, the newest title from Gram Games!

Simple puzzle game with a twist! It’s your job to stack a tower of pieces, but it’s up to you to paint the pieces’ shapes. Match the number you’re given and paint a puzzle piece made of that many blocks!

Be careful, each puzzle piece will affect the tower’s balance. Make sure all none of the pieces fall off or it’s game over! Draw strategically, and do your best to keep everything standing in the new game Paint Tower!

PAINT TOWER! FEATURES:

Create a Tower
• Get creative! Draw different shaped puzzle pieces that matches the number you’re given
• Make sure you place the piece in a good spot or it can affect the tower’s balance
• Be careful where you stack your pieces or the entire tower could topple!

Tons of Challenging Puzzles
• Challenge your mind and complete as many puzzles as you can
• Each puzzle is more challenging than the last – stack your pieces and keep the tower balanced
• Go into the next puzzle thinking of what pieces you can paint!

Stack your puzzle pieces in just the right way so your tower stays balanced. Draw different shaped puzzle pieces and match the exact numbers you’re given. Complete challenging puzzles in Paint Tower!, the newest puzzle game from Gram Games!

Download Paint Tower! and try it out today!

comments: Just downloaded this app.  So far a very well executed app with excellent layout and controls/easy and fluid to use.  Much better than other Sodoku b/c no ads during actual game play!  The only "con" is that I cant put graphics behind gameboard. Only suggestion: Would like to see options for backgrounds like in Solitaire. This would truely make it a 5 star game!   Ps. I was not paid/reimbursed or otherwise incentivised for this review in any way.

Great app! Loads quickly, gameplay is smooth and intuitive. I also haven't found the different levels of difficulty to be repetitive, which is a good thing. I have found with other Sudoku apps, a pattern emerges from each of difficulty so that I almost know what the puzzle will look like by picking how hard it will be.  This one isn't like that thankfully!

Easy to use.   Love the pencil so you can mark choices.   Also like that it tells you if you make a stupid mistake like putting the same number in a column.   Haven't tried the hint feature yet,  but hoping it will help me learn when I don't see any options.

The game is nearly perfect. I enjoy this game very much. But the constant notifications, and/or asking for a review are annoying and unnecessary interruptions (note that notifications are being disabled!).
The only thing I don't love about it is the advertising... but I suppose that's the price of free games. Otherwise, it's fantastic!

This is so easy to use and so addictive. I wasn't good at sudokus before and now I can complete several a day with varying difficulty levels. Very entertaining. The daily challenge is an awesome addition to the game as well. Recommended.

descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!

3 Krinou street
The Oval, Office 701
Limassol 4103

I know you want us to pay for another spin but maybe award a higher number once in a while. All in all cute game.

They raise the prices of the chest to get cards and it's already hard to get the coins to build villages, get raided and attacked so much it takes months to get to the next villages. I hope y'all up the amount of coins on spins because it doesn't go up much at all but the cost of everything else shoots up like crazy.

This game was fun initially. But as you rank up, you gain coins and then before you get to even use them, someone is able to steal them from you (by random spinning.. no planned attack!!)   If you play this game,DO NOT SPEND MONEY TO BUY SPINS. People can steal your earnings... so you basically pay actual money, to give others coins...

description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!

Best. Farm. Ever. Welcome to Hay Day, the most popular farming game on mobiles and tablets, number one in 122 countries.

Learn the lay of the land, tend to your crops, and trade goods with neighbors and friends. It’s a real special place where the crops never die even though it never rains. Sharing the farm with our quirky animals only makes things more fun!

PLEASE NOTE! Hay Day is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

comments: Good game. Advert after every mission and some bullets can go through the guy you're trying to shoot at like a hologram. Graphics aren't good at all but you have got recoil and swaying scope that I noticed as well. All in all, pretty good game. Maybe add a toggle to gold your breathe in the future so that it doesn't sway?

This is a great game but the bottom line is the developers want you to spend money upgrading. You get along so far upgrading with coins, which can be earned. Then they want tokens, which you must buy, to go further. The deals on weapons that are offered are always just out of reach. You can earn diamonds watching videos but I would rather play a game than waste time watching stupid add so I can play a game. It was fun but no more. Deleting.

After the update on 2nd Mar-18, Spec ops not loading. Game simply terminate itself while trying to load spec ops Level 16. Everything else is working fine. I'm stuck üòìüò™ Update: now I can't play even Daily Missionüò©üò§

It is far too difficult to advance in this game without spending money. The developers get money from ads, and I'm willing to watch them, but not for 1 diamond every 30 seconds, when the smallest upgrade in weapons is 360. They must not want people to keep playing an otherwise good game.

This is the most grindy game I have ever played. To get anywhere close to a smooth play through, you have to spend obscene amounts of money. It'd be just as much money to buy a PlayStation 3 and fallout 3, and you'd have better graphics, better shooting, and shorter load times. Plus, every level and every gun has to be downloaded separately. It's over 200 mb for me, and I only played for a day and got to level 2!
Played a bunch of sniper games and so far this one's #1. Going to keep playing and hope i wont have to change my 5star rating. Thanks for a fun free game developers!. Now playing on LG6

descriptionHTML:
AIM and SHOOT! Download now for FREE one of the best fps shooting games!
Start the killing: FIGHT the global war on crime and become the ULTIMATE SHOOTER.

Get yourself a gun and start shooting, clash with the criminals!

Sniper 3D Assassin® in 7 words: great gameplay, awesome visuals and entertaining missions. And best of all? It's a free fps game to pass the time! Defend the victims from kidnappings to bomb attacks, hostage survival is critical!

- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
- HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
- Tons of letal GUNS and mortal WEAPONS
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS)
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
- FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet

DOWNLOAD the app for FREE now and don't miss amazing NEW CONTENT on periodic UPDATES. If you like fighting games, you will love the cool Sniper 3D game! Take down the bad guy from his fantasy, and get the glory for saving the victim. The final word is with you, and the rules are clear: aim and shoot!

Forget those dumb, repetitive shooting games. Here, your duty will include racing against time, exploding helicopters in American cities, killing zombies and quite a few shots in slow motion. Survival is necessary! But can you solve the puzzle, save the victims and kill only the right target hidden in the crowd? Can you stop the virus from spreading? You received the call for duty of saving the people.

Read what millions of extremely happy players have say about Sniper 3D. Check out our reviews!

Sniper 3D Assassin® is brought to you by Fun Games For Free.

The best first person shooter (fps) action game! Be the best professional sniper in every environment! The combat is real, and you can be the hero.

● Hundreds of mission:
"Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, do you copy?" Find the target, aim, shoot.
Save the state secrets from the rogue agents and spies, and stop them from spreading a terrible virus. Do you have the skills? Help your country in the massive nuclear competition. Be accurate and save the hostages and victims of the enemy.

● Start racing to kill a zombie army and prevent global war and destruction. Don't leave any zombie alive: start to shoot and kill them all! Are you prepared to all the action and adventure in this awesome fps shooting game? Can you guarantee the survival of the human race?

● Unlock awesome weapons and upgrade them with evolutions in the arsenal:
Buy the best Sniper rifles, assault rifles, shotguns or Pistols that exist with the gem you earn in the game! Upgrade the ammo, the grip, the calibre to get bullets that inflict more damage, better range, scope, stability, or zoom. Will you choose the hunting rifle, the awesome assault mp5 or a gun Glock or colt in the armory?

● Play it anywhere
Sniper 3D does not require you to be always online in order to have fun. You can enjoy it offline in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on toilet!). From time to time, it may be necessary to download additional (free) content online.

● PvP mode
Try out the pvp mode: prepare your gun and hunt your enemy. You should kill him first. The pvp mode will test your speed in killing and hunting. Take long and you will be dead. Get into action now and enjoy the adventure in this top shooting game! Follow the rules of your training and act!

● Limited data usage
Our game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music. Have fun with limited data usage.

● Disclaimer
Sniper 3D Assassin® is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep away it from your kids and younger boys

comments: Ads after ever single try, even if you only play for 5 seconds before you die. If you're trying to complete a challenge, every couple tries it will reset to free play mode and you have to go intentionally kill yourself which sometimes takes way too long. Then if you don't tap the challenge button exactly right, you have to free play again. Then every time you get back into the challenge screen, you have to scroll all the way through every one you've completed. The game would be fun if it wasn't so infuriating.

I paid the 2 odd dollars to remove the ads since i really enjoyed the game. If you are thinking about doing the same DON'T. Paying the money removes ZERO ads. It simply allows you to skip most of them after 5 to 10 seconds rather than watching the whole 20 to 30 second ad. They still pop up just as often and are just as annoying. Personally I would wait for another developer to make a good clone of the game, shouldn't take long it's a simple engine.

Terrible game. I can't pay twice without having to sit through a full 30 second add. I found it faster to exit out the app and go back in to avoid adds. But there are just too many adds that it made it not fun after the first few goes.

WAY TOO MANY ADS! Its so frustrating that after three failures an ad plays for 30 seconds. Also, why are you asking for access to my storage and location and the ability to make and receive calls? As a developer, get with what your customers want. Then I'll consider buying something.

Far too many ads. One here and there is understandable but after every single try, you get an add. Definitely uninstalled for that reason. As far as the game itself, it's really fun and could be addicting but I spent more time trying to get through the ads than I did playing the game.

A friend purchased no ads, but the game still gives him ads, and the purchase was compete through Google, and they can't even give a refund or fix the app to match the purchase. They just stole the money and refuse to give it back. Also, if you're playing with either wifi or data, the game lags more than if you play with both of them off. Fix your support team and game, there's no reason a network connection should lag a game, that means somethings going on with the app, it doesn't happen with other apps...

comments: Cool looking game played like 15 matches. Annndd then it started freezing. In a single player match i would fire 2 shots and the my entire phone would stop and the only way to get out is to close the app. Im using a galaxy j7

I really like playing the game, it's fun with all the different character mechanics, but after the last update there has been a huge increase in ads that take me away from the game and open up play store or chrome. It does this in the middle of a round, so obviously it screws up my gameplay. Makes me consider paying for no ads, but also makes me want to delete.

Game was fun the first day I downloaded it.  The next day it would freeze during the first battles and I would have to kill the app each time.  This happened multiple times already and with different characters.  I have an LG G5.  Deleting the app since it's not even playable for me.  Such a shame...love these angle games and this one has cool/funnt gameplay.

Very fun and addictive. But there are these ads that open up my internet browser when I'm playing. Also, beeping noise came from the app. I immediately pressed the home button and the beeping stopped, so I know it's the app making those noises. Please fix the ad issue in the next update. :)

An unbelievable amount of ads in an otherwise fun game.   Ads after every match and spam ads trying to open my web browser multiple times mid match, somtimes when I'm preparing my shot which completely ruins it. Such a shame the devs chose to ruin their own game because of greed. Sadly this is more common than not nowadays.
Got some lag when playing pvp with random player. Oponent hp didn't decreased, even if i hit 'em. And also... Too many IN GAME ADS. (sometimes it's very annoying).

comments: The game is good, but the multiplayer needs to be fixed.  It hangs on load and results in the player losing money or gems with no recourse.  It randomly drops ships, and when one player immediatlely gets the best ship and the other player doesn't receive any ship until 10 rounds later, it is impossible to catch up.  Fix the multiplayer, then you get your 5 stars.

I was trying to take advantage of the first time deal. I purchased a deal and for some reason Google play didn't allow me to  complete the charge. The next day I look in my bank account and I have been charged for what Google play said I couldn't do and I was charged another $4 when I didn't even click on anything. I want my money back. That is real shady that you would charge someone for a service that didn't even go through. And where did a $4 charge come from. And there is no way to ask through support to get that back so I'm taking this here where others can see. Don't spend money here or there will be random charged in your bank account.  Update: I do not want a thank you, i want my money back. There's no way to contact the developers except through Google play which already seems shady.

Definitely not worth it. Was fun at first, but after the updated quests, the game took a serious nosedive in quality. Now you HAVE to beat the opponent in order to get anything, otherwise you're out 1000 gold. Before, you would get something just for playing. The new PvP just sucks.

Generic shmup not worth the time not even a bullet hell. So many adds and inapp purchase forced unless you spend hours on end. If you want a amazing shmup go for Tyrain. Much better and has difficulties ranging from dirt easy to near impossible with speed change optional. Tyrain provides a wide range for all players.

I got a new phone and I installed this game on it and it put me on level 5. I was on level 32. I had 56 stars and my combat power was on 72000. If it don't update the game with my current data I don't think I am going to play it anymore. I don't want to star all over again.

Pretty decent game, shame you need to pay gems for the second last ship. The PvP is fun but half the time reduces my gold when I win. Cannot see the devs replying to any messages so unsure if they care

comments: Great except for multi player. Half the time i play against other people their cars are jumping ahead of mine and clearly have some way to cheat and half the time i win, 1st place, it sais i got last and loose like 15 trophies. Fix multiplayer then i will give it 5 stars

Game worked fine up until recently, where when I try to play, I get a message saying "New data to sync. Please stay connected to the internet." The message won't go away no matter what I do. Uninstalling and reinstalling the game didn't work

Was enjoying the game.  Something happened an update or something and now the game has terrible performance, lags and stutters bad, even single player and the challenges.  I have a note 8 so its not on my end.  Tried uninstalling and installing, no change.  Too bad, it was fun.

This game is fun, but I would be setttled with happy if I got to have 10 keys to use in multiplayer instead of just 5. Secondly this app eats too much battery that my OS gives a notification for that every time. Please consider this.
Some probs are there like if we disconnect during the game then - 35 trophies are penalties. Then if i come 1 St then I see that I came 4th. So please take care of these things. Thank u

#1 skid racing game on a touch screen device; I love the top(Ariel view) camera angle in race mode...SUP is #1 flat out racing game but this one here z a gem that I thought was is still in the rough, now appears to be polished. It's so much fun.
description: SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.How to play:- Simply click the button ‚ÄúLeft‚Äù, ‚ÄúRight‚Äù to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.Feature:- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit- 17 different types of cars- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...- New content coming soon!Tips:- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the bestThe most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!We‚Äôd love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. Stay tuned!E-mail: skidstorm@cmcm.comFB: @SkidStormPrivacy Policies:http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/privacy.htmlhttp://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/tos.htmlhttp://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/ad-choice.html
descriptionHTML:
SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.

How to play:
- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.

Feature:
- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit
- 17 different types of cars
- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want
- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires
- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory
- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart
- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...
- New content coming soon!

Tips:
- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up
- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others
- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the best

The most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!

We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. Stay tuned!

E-mail: skidstorm@cmcm.com
FB: @SkidStorm

comments: It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Fantastic concept and artwork and potentially amazing game ruined by a half arsed tutorial and lack of information, pure laziness.  The fun of the game turns to frustration as you get good distance and terrible scores, but why? You assume landings but the game gives you no information on correct technique. Also same for takeoff and mid air lift.   Come on devs its lazy and ruining a game with huge potential. Uninstalled...

Sometimes it makes no sense. You are coming from quailication as 7th, you jump to 2nd position so surely you cant finish worse than 8th? WRONG. You end up on 16th place which is impossible. There is no in between you either win or you finish 14th or lower. You have 30 pts lead in front of number 2. after 1st round, you slightly fail your 2nd jump, guess what? 18th place for you! If you jump for example 120m on a K90 in Q, you finish first because everyone jumped 20m less, sudennly in 1st round you need 130m to secure your first place because everone managed to jump extra 30m. All in all fun, but still needs a lot.

Took me a little while to get the hang of the controls but it's fun once you do. Could maybe do with some hints to help get the best body position in flight, as this took me a while to figure out. Otherwise, it's a good time sink.
The game is fun but you really can't win the early stages so that you can grind the coins and bc of that you only finish 1st or 16th and that is the thing that makes this game so incredibly bad.
No idea how the take off works, seems to be a perfect sweet spot but no tutorials to help you find it. Deleted

comments: I think it's a good game but sometimes the ball would go in but then it bounces out you should also add modes, one like there are walls all around and I like the game keep making these addictive games:D also all you guys stop with the adds just turn off your WiFi let them have some money after hard work on many game's like would you want to make a game and not get money and just get  ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITH ADDS! ohhh that would be soo annoying.

Ya hate ads? Turn off wifi and play. Stupid phone/gaming noobs. Its a good game and dont hate on it for ads. The ads make the people who made the game MONEY. Give then a break. Let them have money while u watch something u might want. If u wanna turn it off, like i said, turn off wifi.

I love the game it is so simple yet super fun. Just the only down side is that there are WAY to many ads. I stared playing a round and then an ad pops up.. Like really. At least put a 15 second ad up after the round is finished where you can choose to wat h and ad to continue after you have missed and your time is up. If that person skips the chance then put up and ad. Or just remove them. Thank you dev for the lovely game though ¬∂:

Don't get me wrong this app is addicting and fun. The thing that ruins this app is ads. For a game were it is meant to be played in quick bursts and you aren't meant to succeed for long periods of time, i don't understand how you can put an ad after every attempt. Sure one per 3 to 5 games and the another 30 second ad, but at the rate they come this game isn't fun anymore. The craziest thing to me is that i can't find a way to invest a few cents into the app to perma-block the ads. Come on dev i know you can do better than this. I will adjust the rating when i am offered a solution. Until then this 4 to 5 star app has 1 to 2 star potential.

It would be 5 stars if for one, the ball didn't just disappear more or less everytime it goes of the screen. And two, if the ball actually moved when i tap the screen rather than decide to just lay on the ground like a dead badger. As for reason three, there are waaaay to many ads. It asks me if i want to watch an ad to continue so then i press no and it still makes me watch an ad, that's just cheap. I understand they have to make money but this is a whole different story here. But  when it does decide to work and when i turn my wifi off, its pretty fun.
Would pay for the game to remove ads. I get you can turn off WiFi/data but it shouldn't be necessary, and is unfair to the company itself. Please offer a paid ad-free version!

description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet‚Äôs Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.

- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!

- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.

Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

comments: Easy to play.  Very addictive.  Game moves as fast, or as slow, as you do; the pace adapts well for both casual and serious players.  You can play on both your desktop and mobile interchangeably with the same account!  Developers are very much a part of the community; constantly improving the game and running in-game events.  While there are in-app purchases I never feel pressured... I spent a few $ because I wanted to support the game as I've been enjoying it throughly.

This is a great game. I have played it for over 2 years now and it's still my favorite game. Advice to newbies, take your time. Stay in one age and build up your resources before moving on. You can play in multiple worlds, join guilds, make friends and they have great quests to do if you choose to.

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. Unfortunatly the problem seem to become worse, I would not spend money on this game, too shaky account control. Will uninstall it now and go shopping for something more reliable. A shame as the game itself is really neat.

This is a wonderful game, great effect and a wonderful story line. My only issue is logging in. I keep getting a message saying my internet connection is not working, yet with no internet connection I would not even get to the sign in page. Please fix this issue or I am done.

Boring!! Hurry up and wait. Never enough coins and forge points. Constantly waiting for buildings to make money and points. Ready made buildings. Can't build your own. Waiting, waiting, waiting. Been playing about 2 hours and already bored to death!
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

comments: The controls are more difficult than the last time I played this game, which was a year or so ago. The new customization is very cool üëå but the fact that even the joystick (my usual preference) doesn't make it better at controlling. I don't know whether it is because of my phone or if it is in the app. Nevertheless good job, game is very addictive, keep up the good work üëå

this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. It's just so addicting and I can't get enough. Everyone in my family loves it too. Creating your own skin is a great option as well. My only complaint is that the 'play online' option is very laggy, and if you fix it would be much appreciated. Thanks for a great game, from sin√©ad, ella, lauren, mollie, shane and ollie üòäüòä

This is better than the browser version for multiple reasons. 1) It doesn't lag as much. I played a few rounds a noticed a little bit of lag, but it's better than the browser version.  2) You can play against AI if you don't want to play against people. I like this because I actually had a chance to win and was able to kill some. 3) You can create your own custom skin, which is awesome. All of this is free as well. I love this version of Slither.io.

So I think just about everyone has heard of this game... Buuuuuuut there are some newbies here so I'll explain. Its a multiplayer game and It's in my opinion that It is probibly #2 best game I've ever played. Great concept and I like to get creative on makeing a snake/worm thing. A+ grade. üëåüëç

Playing this game is total fun. But It would be more Awesome if there will be some sounds & a pause button maybe. One more thing, somebody tell me how to BOOST the Slither because everyone is boosting except meüò≠üòåüò∂üôÑüòìüòëüò´üôÉ

The controlls are pretty bad considering how simple they are.  The lag is unbearable. Fix those and you've got a 5star game all day. Simple fun pick up and put down time killer. In fact the lag is such an issue however, the game is getting uninstalled. You can't play a reaction based game when the lag has you 6 seconds behind whats going on.
description: Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!

comments: I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

Addictive, colourful and charming. I love it because I've spent zero real money on it and am at over level 280! I only use my in game coins when I'm desperate and I'm fine only playing a few times a day to let lives regenerate. Some levels are so frustrating but that's why you save the coins!

I believe the game would be more relaxing if the timed levels were either gone or longer.  Also, 2 stars to complete almost anything is ridiculous.  Takes me a week to play a day.  And the rewards for levels should be higher.  Otherwise, the graphics are nice. The rewards are getting better, would still like 1 star to complete a task.

Addictive, waiting 30 mins for a life is a pain. Also some of the levels are redicilously hard, esp when u get a rubbish sequence, always happens on lemonade levels!  Reason for 3 stars is mostly because, when u have struggled to get the stars for a task, when u open it, it's all chat & u have to get more stars to complete the actual task, I think that's unfair, 3 stars for a phone call, then another 3 for the job?  And the safe task? No option not to do it & can only prevail of the gamers winnings if u spend real money to buy the coins you earned.

Enjoyable but just not enough lives. Phone conversations could be on 1 screen. I know that you can skip them but you might miss something important. Fed up with doing things like using lives to make calls and feeding and training the dog.  I originally gave it a higher rating, but now I've played for some time I realise it's not as great as I thought.  Too many lives used to gain just 1 star now. Need to be able to decorate more.

Should make the money in higher value as it is very hard to accumulate.  Poor marks because it takes so much of your hard earned levels and drops you down the ranks if you don't solve immediately.  I was at ruby level and have so many points taken away now I am back to silver....uninstalling thanks for nothing.
description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:‚óè Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!‚óè Hundreds of unique match-3 levels‚óè Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with‚óè An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up‚óè An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything‚óè Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more‚óè A community that comes first ‚Äî be neighbors with your Facebook friends!‚óè A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenscapesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes Questions? Contact our tech support at gardenscapes@playrix.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory.

Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free!

The game features:
● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!
● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels
● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with
● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up
● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything
● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more
● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!
● A super addicting game you can even play offline!

Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/

comments: So I played it on my iPhone e and loved it. Recently o got a new phone and it's am android. I connected to my Nintendo account and loaded it up. My world seem to be it good shape everything there like in my IPhone but when I went to tour only world one was available. I'm not going to spend another ten dollars to unlock what I already beat so please fix it I wanna keep enjoying this gamr

Love this game and love the nostalgia but there is no way I'm paying ¬£9.99 to level up on any game ever let alone one where a single tap on the screen is the only player interaction. Even with direction control etc like the old days wouldn't make it worth the price being asked.

I have had a very long conversation with someone at the hq and I was talking about the worlds. I bought the worlds on my iPad and downloaded Mario run on this device Android. I ask why my worlds that I purchased on my iPad aren't here. They don't connect that purchase with Nintendo account. When they connect everything else. I told them I am not paying twice so that brings down the rating for me for this game. But great fun and very enjoyable, but get the linking fixed. Seems a bit of a design flaw

This would have got 5 stars had I been able to share it with my 2 kids via family share. I refuse to pay ¬£30 for all 3 of us to have access to all the levels.  Great game though. Fun, quick and easy to play. Many hours spent between us. So many levels too.

Like a big lugger spit in your eye if your a Mario fan. Iv played since the first Mario. For one I very very much hate how u can not control Mario really u just run forward very very annoying. I'd be OK with this if not for the insane price they ask to move on after the 1st world! Highly disappointed in this. Make it like Mario or get rid of it personally

I'd say it's worth it even as a free game.  It's a fun game to kill time. Even if you run out of tickets there's many ways you can earn more on the free side. To purchase at 10 bucks the play becomes almost non stop. Good buy, good time killer, challenging, and overall enjoyable game, free or paid for.  5 stars from me.
description: A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.‚ñ†New mode Remix 10Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!‚ñ†New World Tour coursesA brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.‚ñ†World TourRun and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser‚Äôs clutches! Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.‚ñ†Toad RallyShow off Mario‚Äôs stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow. ‚ñ†Kingdom BuilderGather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.‚ñ†What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds„Éª All courses in World Tour are playableWhy not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?„Éª Easier to get Rally TicketsIt's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■New mode Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■New World Tour courses
A brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
