title: RULES OF SURVIVAL

comments: I LOVE this game My only complaint is in campaign mode it's said more worlds coming soon for YEARS!!! If they're not going to add a world eny time soon  they should at least change the coming soon part. But overall this is a good game and it seems like Cubic Games really care about what the consumers think.

This used to be really cool. If you want to be strong buy gem weapons. It is too hard too earn coins or.gems. Also your opponents must be with same armor or level. I once fought a guy with the minigun shotgun and diamond armor and before I rekt everyone with the demoman but now it sucks

I think this game is brilliant. An absolute pleasure to play and I never get bored. This game should be voted one of the best games ever. Obviously I like other games but this is a whole different story. I just wanted to say please make it so u can join lower levels friends? I can't join my sister and were only five levels apart.

Absolutely great game ,but you made some far too powerful guns too accessible early in the game, so I went down two trophies after I ran into a bunch of wallet warriors. And for God's sakes put a more powerful gun at the end of the campaign, I worked my ass off and it wasn't worth it. Other than that large rant, I love it so much and play it every day. Make exp,gold and diamond easier to obtain though.

I don't like this update. Why does it cost so much to upgrade  weapons 2 more damage higher. And I don't like the fact that all the weapons that have low stars are nerfed. When I was on level 6 the hellraiser was a beast. Then when I got to level 7 I it wasn't as good, so I tried to upgrade it. BUT the price cost 120 coins. I am really disappointed about this. I played this game for 2 years and it sad to see how hard it is to win. They only want money that's it. Make your game better and fair. It's so unbalanced.

It's a great game.... until you reach level 27, then there is a REDICULOUS difficulty curve. I was steadily climbing the tornament leaderboard, I was good, then I kept getting destroyed after hitting 27 with OP items and no gems to get the new weapons, because I had spent them leveling up my weapons and was out. What are you thinking? Lag, not double jumping, not firing when I need to, occasionally. How rediculous.
description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  ‚Ä¢ WORLDWIDE and local.  ‚Ä¢ unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  ‚Ä¢ Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  ‚Ä¢ Up to 8 players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! ‚Ä¢ Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  ‚Ä¢ Up to 4 Players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Chat is available as well! ‚Ä¢ 8 special maps. ‚Ä¢ Hardcore gameplay.  ‚Ä¢ Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is ‚Äúface to face‚Äù with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ A new training camp for first-timers.  ‚Ä¢ More detailed graphics.‚Ä¢ New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. ‚Ä¢ Cool new songs‚Ä¢ More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  ‚Ä¢ A lot of absolutely different maps.  ‚Ä¢ Many types of zombies and enemies.  ‚Ä¢ Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  ‚Ä¢ Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  ‚Ä¢ Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîThis is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.
descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

——————————————————————————————————
This is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.

description: Color by number is fun for adults as well as kids, but have you ever imagine turning number coloring book into 3D and color by numbers in a brand new angle? Now Voxel offers you the whole 3D number coloring experience, much more vivid and interesting than traditional number coloring book! Download now, paint by number and release your inner artist and re pixel mania! **Simple and QuickColor by numbers as known as pixel coloring or sand box coloring is the new trend, but what makes Voxel unique is that you can paint by number in 3D. Choose from a variety of beautiful 3D templates, follow the numbers and color box, and bring these color block to life! Try to rotate the screen and enjoy the beautiful 3D pixel art. **Stress Relief and addictiveMany grown-ups do pixel coloring to anti stress, since number coloring book is like a pixel art therapy. But do you know coloring apps in 3D will give you much more sense of achievements? You will get addictive to paint by numbers in 3D, especially with all the graphics which we work really hard on them. Take your time, relax, and enjoy coloring!**EducationalColor by number coloring book is a great way to teach your kids or students basic number recognition, and it is also important that even youngest can color by number in 3D, so that they become more aware of what a real world means. Having real objects colored, also can get the children to have better understand what they are studying. What‚Äôs more? 3D number coloring apps can actually help practice art drawing skills.Love sharing? Generate cool time-lapse video and share it to all your friends, family members and LOVED ONES! Hope we can make color by number in 3D be your favorite hobby and addicted to it again!Voxel Team
descriptionHTML:
Color by number is fun for adults as well as kids, but have you ever imagine turning number coloring book into 3D and color by numbers in a brand new angle? Now Voxel offers you the whole 3D number coloring experience, much more vivid and interesting than traditional number coloring book! Download now, paint by number and release your inner artist and re pixel mania!

**Simple and Quick
Color by numbers as known as pixel coloring or sand box coloring is the new trend, but what makes Voxel unique is that you can paint by number in 3D. Choose from a variety of beautiful 3D templates, follow the numbers and color box, and bring these color block to life! Try to rotate the screen and enjoy the beautiful 3D pixel art.

**Stress Relief and addictive
Many grown-ups do pixel coloring to anti stress, since number coloring book is like a pixel art therapy. But do you know coloring apps in 3D will give you much more sense of achievements? You will get addictive to paint by numbers in 3D, especially with all the graphics which we work really hard on them. Take your time, relax, and enjoy coloring!

**Educational
Color by number coloring book is a great way to teach your kids or students basic number recognition, and it is also important that even youngest can color by number in 3D, so that they become more aware of what a real world means. Having real objects colored, also can get the children to have better understand what they are studying. What’s more? 3D number coloring apps can actually help practice art drawing skills.

Love sharing? Generate cool time-lapse video and share it to all your friends, family members and LOVED ONES! Hope we can make color by number in 3D be your favorite hobby and addicted to it again!

Voxel Team

Also "TOYOCASH' App is perfect app for anyone in anywhere who has free time and doesn't wana waste it, you can use it while working,studying.. simply earning points by watching Advertisements, videos!

Playing this game has to be the equivalent of going to Hell! No matter what update they bring it's still the same old same day in day out. The fact that upgrades can take a week or more is freaking absurd! I forget that I'm even playing the stupid game smh

Latest patch seems kinda buggy.  What's the point of revenge? I've never been able to use it because my attackers always seem to be live, or have a shield/gaurd. Does anybody use it ever? How long do you have to stalk someone's village before you actually get a chance to take your revenge?  Also, it would be great if you could assign multiple builders to one upgrade or build to shorten the time it takes to upgrade.

Hate new major update.. I think its to rough on casual players.. need to balance it to a setting so hard core players fight hard core n casual to casual.  N hard core players get loot bonus/ multiplier. I'm a casual player n I lose way more loot than gain now bc I get hit way more often. Can't upgrade if u can't save. I don't have time to hut people all day to earn over loss.

This game is the best game in the world... Since i download it i have been playing this game for years...download & play u will see what am talking about remember every thing takes time...u will reach don't rush your base.it take mi yrs get way am going and at Town Hall 9.

I love the game I really do. But damn does it take so much storage. This new update tht just came I had to delete all my pics. And also had to clear data and cache from Facebook and basically delete it. Why so much??? Idk... But its worth it

descriptionHTML:
Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!

Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you!

New Features:
● Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.
● Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.
● Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.

Classic Features:
● Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.
● Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe.
● Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.
● Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.
● Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!
● Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.
● Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades.

PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans.

A network connection is also required.

Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

Parent’s Guide: http://www.supercell.net/parents

comments: A very good puzzle game. Worth the few dollars for no ads. Literally just used my Google Rewards to pay for it. I have only really played Connect.   My only gripe is that the squares or hexes are too small so it is very hard to navigate the puzzle without breaking previous connections. My other issue is that at times connections randomly disconnect. Fixing these issues would make the game more relaxing

It's so addicting and fun. Really makes your brain work. Though when your playing, chances are that your friend sitting next to you will jut their finger in there if your stuck on a puzzle. Not my problem, I don't have any friends. Still fun

I hink this game is great! It is fun and super addictive and has helped me through boredom. The only problem I have with this game is the tangram graphics as it tends to bug quite a bit. Overall I think the game is amazing and I hope to see more stunning content!

We kept getting a big black box which covered the whole game so could not play. It would disappear and you'd try to start but then it would come back straightaway. Could not play it for more than a couple of seconds. Otherwise it was great at first before it started doing this. Is this a glitch that can be fixed please?

Love how many different types of games there is to play very addictive and if you get board playing one game you just pick a different one. It's great for those who don't sleep very well like myself. The only fault is there is far too many adds please get rid of them üòä

Absolutely love this app. Its a great way to pass the time and the fact that it has multiple puzzles all in one is fantastic, since my attention span wavers. This keeps me constantly bouncing around to different challenges so its hard to get bored. ‚ù§

descriptionHTML:
A Collection of
the best and most addictive logic puzzles
with minimalism graphics and unique level design!

"Puzzledom" merged best puzzles like Connect, Blocks, Rolling Ball and Escape which are easy to learn and fun to master into ONE game collection.
As a puzzle lover, you don't need spending much time on searching new brain teasers any more. We will give you a ONE-STOP game experience from now on!

"Puzzledom" collection currently has:
★★ Connect ★★
Connect is a simple game involving connecting dots with same color. When you draw the lines, please make sure the lines don't cross over each other. All the space should be filled.

★★ Blocks ★★
Blocks is a classic puzzle that you need to fill the entire board with different shapes of blocks. You just drag the right block, move it onto the board and match the right place. It's a perfect logic game for brain training.

★★ Rolling Ball ★★
Rolling ball is a path guiding game that you need to slide the blocks to create a channel which makes the white ball move from the start point to the end point.

★★ Escape ★★
Escape is a well known game called Chinese Sliding-Block. The goal is moving the red block to the exit. This game will test your observation skills.

★★ MORE puzzles coming soon★★
We are now working hard on developing new challenging puzzle games. Puzzledom will be the king of brain teasers!


FEATURES
• Tons of manually designed levels
Over 8000 free levels inside and more funny levels are under development.

• Easy but Funny game play
We only put best puzzles inside which will make you can not stop once start playing.

• Minimalism graphics
The art design is simple but beautiful. It's a game for all ages.

• Playing the game with your FRIENDS
We will support online rank list soon! You can challenge your friends by achievement and leader board.

• No time limit
Unlike match 3 games, puzzledom has no time limit. You can play it anytime even with no WIFI. You can use hints to unblock obstacles when you feel struggled in some levels.

Enjoy the game with your family ;)
If you have some good ideas about Puzzledom, please send us an email in the game!
developerAddress: 3 Garden Road, Central, Hong Kong
recentChanges: 1.Fix some minors
2.Optimize the game play
summary: Get the most addictive, app store featured puzzle games in a single download!
title: Puzzledom - classic puzzles all in one

comments: It's a good twist on the base building genre. Whether or not it'll keep me interested long term I don't know. We'll see if, at later stages, it can become like the others where you have to spend money or fail. For now it's very entertaining.

comments: Absolutely love all of the geometry dash games! Colors and graphics are awesome, game play is challenging but fun, and the music is perfect! Only thing I can complain about is that I wish all of the levels from these free versions were in the full version. I own the full version and would much prefer to be able to play these levels without ads and with all of the cool characters and colors I have unlocked. Other than that though, amazing work you guys, keep it up!

Woah. WOAH. WWOOAAHH!!! Oh. Another Chllenging game but thhe only thing i like in it tha it has Dantdm's Old Intro at the press start! Wow. I am pro at Geometry Dash Games and another one oh yea and there is Sub Zero(MK) name there like i saw them quickly. And i would say for the creator: plz. Creator keep the good work! Ok!!! And make more Geometry Dash and can u make something more fun for more people to play with!!!

Oh my god... This is the best geometry dash free game I have ever played,  and is almost more fun than the full version.  Robtop, you have regained full respect after what happened with meltdown. I'm just speechless, at the amount of work that was put into these three levels, going from the camera angles to the animations. This game is not like meltdown,  which is three short amateur levels, but with three long, harder levels. This game is like a preview to 2.2, and I know it's going to be good.  We'll done, Robtop! Keep up the great work!

This just blows my mind... one thing I would like to see in the future is some rob-top made tutorials on how each editing items works in the game so other players can feel more comfortable making their own levels and not be intimidated by all the other fan made levels... I am one of those players who is intimidated by the other fan made levels... This could help young and creative minds to create their own levels their friends can enjoy. Thanks 10/10

I love this game so much.  Some of the effects and colours added into the game make it so fun to play and watch. Its challenging and thats what makes it fun. Its not like one of those games that are so easy you finish it in an hour. This game takes time and effort. Also the backround music is pretty cool. Especially nock em with headphones. controls are very easy to use, just tap to jump and usually hold to use the vehicles, so easy! This game is perfect and absolutely fun. I would highly recommend downloading geometry dash subzero.

Don't get me wrong, these new levels and songs are fun and addictive and all of the new stuff is awesome... but stop making new apps? Why not just update the original? It's kind of frustrating to have a paid version with stuff I've unlocked but have to deal with an unpaid version (aka, ads) and have to unlock skins and colors all over again because new apps keep being made.

comments: This is an awesome game that gives you daily and weekly quest's and offers treasure chests. Now they have new levels to play and collect like blazing sands, and the spooky summit level for Halloween. Then they added the new global challenges.This game just keeps growing, not like many of the other games that just stays the same..you will be amazed. Now they added Global challenges, with new head gear...like I said this game keeps growing...it runs so smooth and the graphics are awesome. If you haven't tried it. Do it. If you have come back and be amazed at the changes.

Thx for updating Frozen Shadows. Blazing Sands still needs work. Too much water, not enough Sand. Needs a "slide," I recommend sand surfing. The canyons also get boring. The variations between it and the other levels don't compare, especially for the gem cost to play it. Still, fun and relaxing, and stays fun. 4/5.

I love all the graphics it's a bit like the        piano tiles it test's your fast skills but except it is temple run 2 love it. Except for the controls though cause sometimes if i turn it to right it goes to left and sometimes it bumps into the tree same to the left you need to fix the controls more.

It's my favorite app. I love it a lot. My only issue is that it doesn't quite accurately update my stats especially my highest score without using a 'save me,' longest run, most coins & gems. I would really like the developers to look into that but otherwise it's a brilliant game.

This is a good mindless game but the interactions have been inconsistent which leads to frustration. They also insist on scrolling through ALL achievements which pops up in the most inconvenient place and this happens multiple times per access, not just at the start. Possibly the most annoying thing ever. Also I would rather be able to pay to have ads removed besides special perks, the lack of this means this games life is limited to me.

Nice, good, adventure game.but some times your team irritating who one completed thirteen level they will easily get diamond  your giving master challenge ( now the challenge Chinese New year )who one complete your giving thirty diamond only.this offer will useful only for entry level gamers. Most of players finished fourteen level so they no need diamonds.so think about genius players.

description: The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!How to Play:- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded. - At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles  to get higher score Features: + easy operation but lots of fun.+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.+ Different roles dress+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly+ A combination of multiple bubbles	+ No wifi can also playif you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!
descriptionHTML:
The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!
How to Play:
- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.
- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.
- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded.
- At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles to get higher score
Features:
+ easy operation but lots of fun.
+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.
+ Different roles dress
+ Many interesting props to help you pass game quickly
+ A combination of multiple bubbles
+ No wifi can also play
if you like bubble shooting game,It is worth to try. Let's play it!
summary: Classic and funny bubble shooting game. all free.
title: Bubble Shooter

comments: Ok, so I will be calm in this review. Whenever I have the same car in a battle with red, we ram each other, but they push me off the map with ease. The main reason why I wrote a review for this game is that you should make the alien levels a little easier. The last level for it is way too hard, you can barely aim at the boss. The controls are hard too. Also can you optimize the game for the Samsung Galaxy tab A?

I would have given this game a higher review than three that I have given it, the problem is that I have noticed a problem when trying to save some money. For me at least when trying to save money through the daily giveaway/present of playing the game everyday it has stolen money from me discreetly whenever I get around the 1000 coin mark sometimes it is one hundred sometimes I have lost 400 with no explanation as to where the money is. It is for this reason that I have lowered my rating. (Besides the disappearing money I enjoyed the game.)

This game is pretty good, for the most part. The only problem is the bots you go upagainst are  way to hard. I can never win. I would have gave them 5 stars but I gave them 4 stars because of the bots. And the game is kinda hard to control. When I move backwords on a veichel it goes up.

Good for killing time. Some of the computer driven opponents seem to have a very decisive advantage at initial start of certain stages, and some of the smaller vehicles are too sensitive on the controls  but overall decent game.
This game needs major fixes, on mission mode, I get my reward after completing a level but I can't ever go anywhere after it. So I never get to move on the next level. üòí
Great game, would just love if replays were available to more phones, mine isn't able to do replays yet. Just wondering if it might be coming soon. I've got a Pixel 2.

comments: This game is very fun and addictive but should have offline mode so we don't have to deal with a hacker every game.  Also after new update I'm having issues getting into the game. It says "check comnection" and my connection is fine even tried uninstalling it and all. Other games work on my phone and so does my Wi-Fi. The game just worked last night for me now it doesn't! PLEASE FIX!!

Please bring back the old brewery map. I have been a long time player of this game, and loved the original brewery map. The new update of the map is so radical that it feels like an entirely different map, with all the pathways and corners. The uniqueness of the original brewery map is that it is small, and relatively open, so that combat is focussed and fun. There is more time fighting others than moving around trying to find enemy players. The new update just ruins that uniqueness, making it feel like the Bureau or Legacy map. I am okay with the new brewery map being a new addition, but please make it "Brewery 2" and bring back the original Brewery.

Could you please add an offline mode...would be nice to practice on the go. Also please please please add more guns. I have been playing this game for a year and still no new guns but glad you are keeping up with the maps. I have this HUGE problem, it says check connection when I have good connection. I tried to restart my phone and reconnect but still doesn't work. PLEASE FIX.

I love the game, it's great and there's not many fps games like these for mobile phones. My only problem is I can never play ranked. For whatever particular reason I can't even find other players. The game just stays searching forever and I really want to play ranked. I would have voted 5 stars but thats the only thing that bugs me. Please fix and will be happy to give 5 stars.

Just good. This game is great. The controls are completely customizable so you can make it work the way you want it to. Graphics are on point, better than 2nd Gen consoles, lesser than 3rd gen. If this game came out in the age of the PS2 I would have bought it. Also, buy a box because this game couldn't have been cheap to make. This game should cost like $25.

I love C-OPS. It is one of the best FPS games for Apple and Android devices. It is very popular, few servers are empty. On lowest settings with 2 gigabytes of RAM, it runs at a BUTTERY 50 frames per second. Also, controls can be customized. I just notice a few graphical glitches.
description: Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard.  Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!The game currently features 2 game modes: Defuse and Team Deathmatch.In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase camos to customize your favorite weapons.Follow us on social media:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGameYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEntPrivacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?

Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!

The game currently features 2 game modes: Defuse and Team Deathmatch.
In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.
In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.

Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase camos to customize your favorite weapons.

comments: Is this game for You? Do you enjoy spending most of the game watching ads? Do you enjoy games that make it impossible to play without spending real money? Do you enjoy being grabbed by the crotch so hard you change genders?  If you answered yes or no to any of these then no this game is not for you. It's nothing but a crappy game designed to rake in as much money as possible, rather than making something fun. Forced to watch 30 second ads after each round. Forced to use the currency you earn when you don't want too. Enemy power will suddenly jump up 10 fold making spells and goldimpossible to gain without watching an addition 30 second ad. Even if you win and get the key you are forced to watch a 30 sec ad to unlock as if you didn't get a key.

Should be called adzy. During the level theres an ad banner at the bottom. At the end of every level there's an ad, some you can't skip and have to wait an entire 30 secs to sit through. To make matters worse, the chests can be boosted by 50% by watching, you guessed it, an ad.  They don't even give you a shop option to remove ads for a small amount of money or some sort of package. Pure plain greed

All in all it is a really great game there are very few ads, its fun, the graphics are crisp. Its amazing except for one thing. On one of the levels all of the monsters have exactly 666 health and im not religious or anything but I'm pretty sure that if some one who is religious see's that, well lets just say that it might not be good for the company, so I suggest you fix this.  Thanks.

Good little time waster, simple classic gameplay but puts its own unique twist on it.   Side note: I clearly played this game more than they thought anyone would as I have started getting repeated designs when I upgrade my spells xD

It stopped working on my One plus! Help! I was excited about the side games! *********************************** Excellent, addictive fun. I reached shield 135 (level 1154) and it doesn't level up any more. Gutted! Still a great game but so sad I can't progress any more. No reason why really! Incidentally, good for helping kids with Mathematics.

This game is simple. So simple that it is stupidly addictive at times when my mental and physical ability equates to a bowl of fruit. Nothing in this game brings me more satisfaction than the immensity of lag when bolts are caught in rapid bounce in a confined space. I say that with the utmost sincerity, no sarcasm at all. The lag is so intense, so joyful to watch. Please don't take it away from me. It is beautiful.
description: Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You‚Äôre a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they‚Äôre fully vanquished before they reach you. descriptionHTML:

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:
Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success.

****READY YOUR WEAPONS****
They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.

**** INTENSE GAME PLAY ****

comments: This is a great game and is challenging it definitely requires some focus and concentration. this is a very good game for training your concentration, you cant just randomly played it.. timing and dexterity are main thing here, and love how this game makes my heart race, just as any good game.. really loved it.. and the premium for no ads are cheap, thank you HBA dev.

description: In LEGO¬Æ Juniors Create & Cruise, boys and girls can use their imagination to create their very own LEGO minifigures and fun vehicles like cars, helicopters and trucks. Having more than 50+ million downloads confirms that this is one of the best games for kids in 2017 and can be considered one of the best games for girls and boys.LEARNING THROUGH PLAYHelp your kid develop skills and understanding by playing the best game designed for kids by LEGO in 2016 and 2017.  Creativity and play are the main values behind this game and it is a great experience for kids to learn and understand play on digital devices.GAME WITH NO IN-APP ADVERTISING & GAME WITH NO IN-APP PURCHASESYou can be sure that your kid will be able to play in a safe environment. descriptionHTML:
In LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise, boys and girls can use their imagination to create their very own LEGO minifigures and fun vehicles like cars, helicopters and trucks.

Collecting coins will unlock LEGO sets in the game that can be built with a few easy touches – and which will become part of the game’s colorful 3D scenery for your child’s next drive-through.

Create & Cruise provides plenty of inspiration for real-life LEGO builds and imaginative play scenarios that you and your kid can reenact out at home – like how to mix and match your LEGO bricks to build something new, or how to interact with your creations. Play as fun characters like a ninja, princess, police officer and many more!

Features:
*No in-app purchases
*NEW levels with engaging scenery
*NEW models – which means fun new build and play experiences. Now your child can play with helicopters and big trucks!
*Minifigure selector and lots of creative vehicles to mix and match – the more you play, the more you unlock!
*Bright, fun and friendly animations and soundtrack
*Intuitive icons and navigation for easy gameplay – no reading or writing skills required
*Virtual building with LEGO® bricks
*No third-party advertising
*No links to websites

About LEGO® Juniors:
LEGO® Juniors is designed to give children age 4-7 a great first experience with the LEGO brick through iconic, fun and Easy to Build models. LEGO Juniors sets contain quick start elements and numbered pre-packed bags that can be built without help from Mum or Dad – which makes any small builder extra proud.

LEARNING MADE FUN
LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise is a free learning game for boys and girls. You choose your role, edit your character and drive through a fun and friendly environment. This game is a fun educational game that will allow your kid to develop his mind and motoric skills in one of the best education apps for kids.

BRAIN GAME FOR KIDS
This brain game for kids will develop your girl or boy and it is even fun to play by adults. It includes a “pretend play” feature that allows your creative kid to edit his LEGO character and customize it in an original way while cruising through the environment.

BUILD AND DRIVE
LEGO® Juniors Create & Cruise is one of the trending apps and games in Google Play. Having more than 50+ million downloads confirms that this is one of the best games for kids in 2017 and can be considered one of the best games for girls and boys.

LEARNING THROUGH PLAY
Help your kid develop skills and understanding by playing the best game designed for kids by LEGO in 2016 and 2017. Creativity and play are the main values behind this game and it is a great experience for kids to learn and understand play on digital devices.

GAME WITH NO IN-APP ADVERTISING & GAME WITH NO IN-APP PURCHASES
You can be sure that your kid will be able to play in a safe environment. This game does not include any in-game advertising and parents can consider the app a safe digital environment for their kids. Furthermore, kids cannot purchase anything inside the app.

FAMILY GAME FOR PRESCHOOLERS
This is primarily an educational game for preschoolers because it helps them to play and develop their brain and skills in a 100% safe environment.

For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus

descriptionHTML:
One of the best free games in the world, MY TALKING TOM HAS BEEN THE NO.1 GAMES APP IN 135 COUNTRIES! Play now and see for yourself why the game’s so popular!

Adopt Talking Tom as your very own baby tamagotchi-style kitten and help him grow into a super cool fully-grown virtual cat. Dress him up in different outfits and fur colors, and choose from loads of accessories to make him look however you like! Whether you’re a kid or an adult, there’s no end to the cool fun you can have with Tom as your virtual pet!

With this new update, TOM FINALLY GETS HIS DREAM OUTFIT – a fireman’s uniform! Now he can look cooler than ever before. And you can both have fun playing with his new interactive fire-breathing dragon helmet!

Join the fun now and play for free!

- PLAY POPULAR MINI-GAMES: Earn gold coins and have fun playing all kinds of games, from puzzle to action adventures! Rocket Fun, Tom Run, Flappy Tom, Happy Connect, Bubble Shooter, Rainbows, Brick Blast and more are all free to play!

- NURTURE YOUR VERY OWN TOM: Name him, feed him his favorite foods, play with him, tuck him into bed, and watch him grow from a cute baby to a fun kid, and finally into a super cool fully-grown virtual cat.

- TRAVEL AROUND THE WORLD: Collect your tickets and fly to meet other Toms. Fill your album with postcards from different places and unlock clothes fit for a true adventurer.

- UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY: Customize your very own Tom by choosing from thousands of combinations of furs, outfits, and accessories. Decorate his home and choose the best furniture to make his house look cool.

- INTERACT WITH TOM: Talk and Tom repeats everything you say. Poke, stroke and tickle him, and watch how he responds.

- ENJOY LIFELIKE EMOTIONS: Tom can be happy, hungry , sleepy, bored... The list goes on! His emotions change based on how you play with him.

- GET REWARDS AS YOU PROGRESS: Help Tom grow through 9 different stages and 999 levels, unlocking new items and coins as you go!

***Take good care of your favorite virtual pet, Talking Tom, and make him a part of your life!***

Download the game now!


This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect your child’s personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- The possibility to connect with friends via social networks;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/

comments: I love this game!! "it helps a lot" with my shopping addiction because I feel like I'm buying real merchandise. I really enjoy the updates and how you guys added more room to be designed!!!! Also the 2d & 3d option to view products is awesome!! and if your  studying for interior design this is the app for you! I love the voting of others designs, you get to view everyone creativity. I really love how you guys never ask for an rating....like some apps by the 1st go you get popups please rate our app you guys never asked for an rating I choose to. Thanks for getting me addicted :))

I really love this game. I love voting and seeing what other have also come up with. I love that it is really world design where you can actually shop for pieces and not cartoon rubbish. However, I have had a number of issues where the game has had to restart and have even lost diamonds and cash after trying to collecting daily rewards when it re starts, watching endless adds and not receiving rewards for them or downloading other useless games I have no interest in and actually playing them to generate rewards and not receiving them either. These are my only issues with the game. Other than these it would be five stars.

Great application. Very enjoyable. Only complaint wish app had more international design furniture to match the themes and settings. Also need to fix the bug so that the design loading screen appears.  This is the only app that I have to reset my tablet to get my results, since the last update I have had this issue. I have made an inquiry adressing this issue and it still has not been fixed. I have changed my rating because of this issue, once it has been addressed and fixed I may change my opinion.

I love this game.  The only home design game there is. Glad that that they have added items to the shelves more realistic.  Sometimes I feel it is over designed.  I wouldn't always add that footstool or bench.  It is also difficult to play without spending money and I cannot afford to do that.  Keys are required to decorate properly (plants, decor) and can take a long time to accumulate.  This is my favourite game though and I will continue to play and patiently wait just do my best with what I have.  I do watch the videos to gain more keys but woe is me...

Entertaining, enjoyable and inspiring! Brings out  your creativity in utilizing your available resources and in maximizing your limited funds. The game makes you travel around the globe.  Hope to seeing homes from less popular countries. Sad to note that there are times that free diamonds don't add up after watching the videos and there are items not found in the warehouse.

The game is fun, but results take 2 and 3 days and if other people are on higher levels they have access to better tableware and vases, pictures etc, so their rooms stand out more and they have a better chance at getting 5 stars. And some items I've purchased don't work it gives a message saying they couldn't find it in the warehouse. But the game never gave me my gems back and of money. NEED TO FIX IT

comments: Downloaded this through another app (free golden eagles) where if you downloaded and played this game, and got castle to level 10 would be rewarded. Sent off request to support a number of times with proof and no reply, and after a week still no reward.   So if you are downloading this to get reward from another app don't bother as you won't get it

Waste of time. I started playing the game as an offer to get points for another game. Vikings is not a bad game on itself but I feel cheated when I'm promised something and IronSource does not honor their part of the bargain. IronSource said the Plarium did not verify my completion of the offer, so I won't play it anymore nor try other Plarium content nor IronSource advertised games. The actual content is fine, but the business practices are deplorable.

Great time killer, I love the interaction and concept of the game. It can get a bit laggy at times and at it's worst, it will crash on you. The wait times are unbearable though. No ads at all since the first time I played too!

Too late to join this game. As soon as you lose your newbie protection you become a farm for higher level players, preventing you from progressing. Every morning you find all your resources pillaged and your troops dead or incapacitated. Maybe I'm just in the wrong timezone.

The game has the same problems as the other versions. The events boost strong players which makes the gap in strength larger. The premium items are overpriced. Probably the worst I have seen, there is no protection for your silver. This means stronger players always have a reason to attack someone weaker and there is no protection in place after being successfully attacked.

The game itself is great. Zero complaints there. But the fact that it I am unable to ever log in is infuriating. I've literally been zeroed out because the app won't let me log in... multiple times. It's absolutely ridiculous. Needs to be fixed.

comments: Awesome game I had ever played in my life... although I'm 20 just..üòâüòâ I just loved the game.today 21/02/2018 I installed it on my phone.within 1 hr I played 100+ times. Till now my highest score is 74 & I'm in challenge 25. Really loved this game very much. I recommend this game to my each & every friend...(even my enemy also...üòÇüòÇ Just kidding) I wished that I will cross 1000+ score on future.  Loved this game. Lots of Love to this game & ketchapp. üòòüòòüòò‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

A simple, addictive yet hard and raging game. I love how you can customize your spheres and roads--and to turn off the ads just turn off your WiFi or data. Honestly, after 250 it gets a little impossible to play lol. Keep up the good work, Ketchapp!

Another great game from ketchapp. A very unique idea, executed well and with nice graphics. It is simple yet difficult, a good combination. I gave it 4 stars however, as sometimes the game takes a while to respond to my touch, and often doesn't respond at all. My phone is quite slow though, so I'm willing to give the game the benefit of the doubt.

Enjoyed, On a overall basis i really enjoyed the game. And i also finished all the 100 challenges within a time of 5 days, as the game is really captivating i kept on continuously playing it. But now i am kind of bored from it as there's nothing to do after i have completed the 100 challenges. If there is an addition of another 100 more challenges that would make the game more fun to play and i would enjoy it thoroughly. Also i am not sure how will i earn the other spehers and roads without any challenges, so if anyone can help me how in figuring that out it would be really nice. At the end the game is really good. Cheers to the creaters.

I've noticed that when I get higher in the challenges the ones involving lane switching glitch out and never let me complete it. I have counted and I don't think it is possible for me to have counted incorrectly 20+ times repeatedly. Also now whenever I boot up the game it has the beginner tutorial pop-up telling you what to do which is annoying.
Fun little time killer. My only problem is that daily rewards fail to show up most days. It could be a problem on my end, but I don't know, and it's a pretty small issue so I don't really care.

comments: This game is amazing! A real time waster and It's really fun! Also, everything's a BIT expensive... Other than that, It's a really good game! Well done Outfit7 üòÑ‚ù§

Everything players have asked for is added. At a ridiculous price.  But if people are paying that's on them.   HOWEVER you shouldn't have to buy the adult /baby formula more than once. If you bought it you should be allowed to switch back and forth as you wish.    It's a really zen pass time  game :) also cute and interactive.

I was honestly thinking about giving this 3 stars just b/c of how annoying that is alone.

descriptionHTML:
Explore Talking Angela’s world and customize her fashion, hairstyle, makeup and home - all while playing addictively cute mini-games.

With over 165 million downloads already… don’t miss out on the fun!

ADOPT BABY ANGELA
Adopt Angela as your very own virtual pet and give her a fabulous life! Help her grow into a stylish city kitty. From teeth brushing to clothes shopping – she’s all yours!

TAKE CARE OF HER
Make Angela your very own superstar! Nurture her, sing to her, feed her delicious treats. Just watch – she’ll become your new best friend!

CREATE COLORFUL MAKEUP
Let your stunning sense of style shine through by giving Talking Angela a style make-over!
Lipstick, eyeshadow, blush - customize to your heart's content! With dozens of different colors and endless creative freedom; you can really express yourself!

EXPRESS YOUR FASHION FLAIR
You’re fabulous, so make Angela fabulous too! Dress her in the latest fashions and the cutest costumes, from beautiful ballerina to punk ninja! Complete the look by giving her the perfect hairstyle too! With over a million different fashion combinations, you can create something truly unique!

PLAY MINI-GAMES
Discover and play amazing new mini-games! From Happy Connect to Bubble Shooter - all your favorites are here… and more are added all the time!

AND MUCH, MUCH MORE...
Unlock exclusive new outfits, level up, collect special stickers, customize her fabulous home… all while she repeats everything you say - in classic Angela style!

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child’s personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct users to other apps and Outfit7's websites
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via You Tube integration
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchase using real money (level progress, games, in-game functionalities, ads)

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/

descriptionHTML:
Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! Switch and match candies to create 3 in a row, or match 4 (or more) to make delicious special candies! Complete the goals before you run out of moves to progress through deliciously fun levels. It's that simple!

Switch and match scrumptious candies to make mouth-watering combinations and play challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and Candy Bears! Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

New Candy Crush Soda Saga features: 

* Over 1000 Sodalicious levels
* New Game Modes include:
Soda – switch bottles and candies to release purple soda and save the Candy Bears
Frosting – match candies to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free
Honey – match candies next to the honey to release the trapped Candy Bears
* Scrumptious new candies and sublime new combinations:
Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish
Match 7 candies to create the remarkable Coloring Candy
* Explore juicy new environments and meet the kookiest characters
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush never looked so tasty
* Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master
* For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Sodalicious scores
* Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Are you already a fan of the new Candy Crush Soda Saga?  If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

www.candycrushsodasaga.com
facebook.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga 
twitter.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Soda Saga!

comments: Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

For a shoot 'em up racing android game it's really addictive. I'm always playing it. It's fun. My only complaint is the time it takes for the fuel to charge, 30 mins? Come on! Otherwise very challenging. Challenge accepted!

I really enjoyed this game until it started crashing mid game. Happened to me just recently and I wasted all my available fuel trying to frantically restart the game.  I was just completing the assigned jobs when the game suddenly stalled and I had to restart it again just to find it stalling again, all the while consuming the fuel with each restart. Hope to see this problem rectified soon, otherwise it's an enjoyable game nonetheless.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me
I enjoy playing the game. I gave you 2 stars because of one thing: the fuels are gone after I open my data connection even though it just got 5/5. Can domebody please tell me where did the fuels go..

descriptionHTML:
THEY TOOK YOUR CITY. THEY SHOULD’VE TAKEN YOUR CAR!

Reclaim your No.1 position as you blast past other players and outrageous gang bosses in Fastlane: Road to Revenge!

Pick-up this FREE classic arcade shooter and play anytime OFFLINE!

BUST OUT THE BIG GUNS
• 20 exotic cars to collect and upgrade.
• 10 unique & powerful UAVs.
• Game changing vehicle transformations to rain destruction on your rivals: Talon Gunship, Vulcan S-22, Tempest C-3.
• More gear and gadgets than Elon Musk!

CHALLENGE PLAYERS WORLDWIDE
• Blast your way past players the world over.
• Overtake rivals to steal their score bonus.
• Race through 30 player leagues with escalating difficulty.
• Challenging environments and lethal obstacles.
• Can you reclaim your status as top boss?

RICH STORY CAMPAIGN
• 11 crazed bosses hell bent on stopping you in your tracks.
• Complete the campaign and reveal the identity of the boss who took over your turf.

HUGE SOUNDTRACK
• Actual in-game radio allows you to select your own beats.
• Wide selection of in-game music.


Please note that Fastlane is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases. You can play Fastlane offline but a network connection is required for in-app purchases and League Promotion.

Rebuild.Roads, city planning as well as the strategically placement of every building and infrastructure, these essential duty are on your shoulders, commander, may our city be productive and prosper under your command.[Repopulate]As much as we want to ignore this fact, but there are still people in the outside world at risk of being devoured by flesh hungering zombies at every tick of the clock. descriptionHTML:
Commander! They’re here…Battle is waiting

[Survival]
The Virus has gotten loose, and a large portion of the human race has been turned into mindless walking deads. Only a few of us has gathered enough supplies to barely make do on this zombie stricken land. Yet things only worsen as dusk approaches. We need YOU, Commander, Come train your Army, to resist, to Build your Empire and lastly to rekindle the dwindling flame of humanity.

[Rebuild]

The definition of humanity isn’t just survival, but to flourish, as soon as we regain our grounds, we need to take the next logical step. Rebuild.

Roads, city planning as well as the strategically placement of every building and infrastructure, these essential duty are on your shoulders, commander, may our city be productive and prosper under your command.

[Repopulate]
As much as we want to ignore this fact, but there are still people in the outside world at risk of being devoured by flesh hungering zombies at every tick of the clock. They can be anywhere, and we MUST help them, not only is it the right thing to do, but they’ll also be important members of our community, and eventually help us, in building, production and fighting off zombies as well as bandits.

[Trade]
Being isolated isn’t ever going to help the development, even if the world is over ran with zombies, and what’s the best approach to break the isolation barrier you ask? One word, Helicopters, Somehow in the midst of all the destruction, we managed to salvage a functional one, and it’s now at your disposal commander, use it well, so we may obtain and trade the resources in dire need for our survival, production and our future.

After the dust settles, how will you rule?

Facebook Fan Page: https://business.facebook.com/Last-ShelterSurvival-1052880828147974/?business_id

comments: It's OK I love to play the game when I'm bored and it helps me to be settled back and have a good time. But these all happens when I'm offline. But when I'm connected to Wi-Fi there's too many ads just slapped into my face. Yes I understand that you'll get these ads but ketchapp seriously,will you give and ad while I'm playing the game??!! It's too much for me. But still I love the game so I just play it turning my Wi-Fi off in my mobile.

Well before I say my review, I would like to clear out a few of the negative reviews. There are not very many ads at all, in fact I barely ever even get any. Second, the controls don't suck, they are just wobbly, but that is the point. Without the difficult turning, the game would be too easy. With that all said, this game is pretty fun.
THIS GAME IS THE WORST!!! Save yourself some time and DON'T install this thing I can barely move the car so please make easier to control. I know your trying but I,m sorry I,m uninstalling this game.
It's stupid. It's really boring after your first try! And, when you come to a turn, the car doesn't turn fast enough. When you turn before a turn, it turns too fast. This thing is hacked.
Difficult to master, weave through the road and collect gems on your way. Simple and addicting. Ads get a little annoying and are placed in a bad way (bottom of the screen).
I know people were asking for different controls, but the new tap contols are turning the game into something so much less original.  Why don't you make the steering wheel work like in real cars?

comments: Its a good game, i like this kind of games and i love when i play with friends too! The game its really easy to play, a strategy game and simply as destroy the enemy base... Love it! Its true that not all are going to like this but for me this game its 5 stars. Btw i have started the game and i said i love to play with friends, does this game has a Couple/Duo match to play with them (Not versus them). Thanks in advice, keep staying great!!

The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

This game is awesome, it reminds me of Guns Up! . The ONLY thing I don't like about it is it's basically pay to win. I only have 5 slots to open chests and it cost gems to open the chest and money to get gems. Other than that, the gameplay is solid. It's very unique in it's actually a wonderfully crafted game and not some thrown together garbage. I probably will end up throwing money at it only because it's made so we'll. But like I said I do feel the process for opening chests is a bit too cash hungry...

comments: Uninstalled and reinstalled app because the update made it to where the game was unplayable. Went to login, using Facebook credentials. It says it failed because I would not allow them access to my friends list. Something doesn't seem right about that. Never had a game NOT allow me to login, after denying access to my friends list. Sorry, would prefer you not send messages to all my friends with my name tagged on it.

As football based game it is superb, in terms of gameplay, graphics etc. But the biggest idiotic part of this game is that if freezes like magic. The whole game main screen becomes unresponsive and stays like that no matters the game is restarted or the damn phone is. Get this thing sorted out Miniclip. You have a reputation to maintain or not?

I think this game is a really fun addicting game. The main reason why I got it was because of 8 ball pool. That game is also very fun. The only thing I don't like about football strike is that when I get on sometimes it won't let me click the spinner. So it's like my phone froze. But my phone didn't freeze. It's just the app. So can you guys please fix this.

At first I was skeptical about this game. I had downloaded it and went without playing for a couple of weeks. Then,one day I just happen to open the app and play. Best move I ever made for an app! This game is just flat out addicting, fun and challenging.  I was pleasantly surprised about how much fun it is and that there is, most of the time, something new.  Chalkenign friends and new people always makes for a challenging and fun time waster. Even if I don't have the time to play, I still make time!! Haha

There is a bug in your game I went first of my league, supposingly I am entitled to 350 cash, but it wasn't there.  How could you make it so unfair for someone. Why bother having a prizes if not given to the right person.

I didn't get my prize and I'm really very upset. I have a screenshot of winning cup also.. I hope miniclip will help me. I'm expecting my prize from you. I really love this game.

descriptionHTML:
You’ve never played a football game like this before. Take on your friends in multiplayer free-kick face-offs, or make a name for yourself in the Career Mode!

Challenge the world across different online game modes! Hit the targets in a fast-paced, time-limited battle for points in Shooting Race mode, or take turns as both striker and goalkeeper in the one-on-one Free Kick mode!

Customise your striker and goalkeeper with tons of unlockable items! Show off your style or represent your team’s colours!

Take on Career mode, travelling through different stadiums around the globe and taking on unique soccer challenges to unlock medals!

With simple, fast gameplay, Football Strike is easy to play and offers endless competitive football fun!

KEY FEATURES:

• Take your shot and make amazing saves, all with the flick of the finger!
• Play online in Shooting Race and Free Kick modes!
• Play against friends or challenge players from across the world!
• Represent your favourite team! Play as FC Barcelona, Borussia Dortmund, FC Zenit, FC Schalke 04 and more!
• Conquer an extensive Career Mode to earn medals!
• Upgrade your player and equipment and take on the world’s best!
• Fast-paced gameplay means there’s always action!

comments: This is a very fun game. It got me hooked for hours. However, there are still some things that need improvement. For example, when walking sideways along fences you can get over them. This is an issue as once i did this and fell into the water not being able to get back on. Also, the spikes do not seem to have an effect on the shark so they are useless. I do believe that the developer needs to continue to work on this game and introduce new items and uses for them.

You cannot walk on wooden fundations and you cannot walk on single or double foundations. Please fix this it is very annoying and im not able to play the game, because when the shark attacks in a corner you cannot hit him with your spear. This is the same for the zombie. I built a little house on the raft and it spawned behind the wall of my house. Please fix it

It's honestly a pretty good game, it's fun, even though there's no real end goal and a lack of side quests. Although many improvements can be made to the game, the worst part is the ads, it's really bad, and it's insulting as a player that they try to milk this much out of us. You have constant random ads that take over your game at any moment. 5 ads per chest you craft to unlock each slot, ads when you switch to the map, floating treasure chests that require ads to open, even more pointless ads at every crafting bench, and the list goes on. I would gladly even pay to play an ad free version, but this is just ridiculous.
When will there be quests?  I'm up to level 10 and have a badass raft but there is nothing to do and I can't build the chemistry table. I have no way to get mortar and pedestal.
I never get any mission do to. Give me an update plz
Its a awesome games but the problem is the aids!! This game same like (last day on earth survival) so guys i hope u remove the poor aids okay

descriptionHTML:
Discover! Create! Survive!
Your home is an endless ocean. Your neighbors – ruthless sharks, sea creatures and relentless nature. The only refuge is a raft. Improve it, craft everything you need to escape from the ocean trap, survive by all means!

🐋 Our survival on the raft advantages:

🌎 Real-life survival simulator
Check your health, hunger and thirst indicators, struggle sharks attacks. Meet the challenges and try to survive, it’s all up to you!

⚓ Resources hunting
Use a hook and catch necessary resources: wreckage, chests and barrels from the ocean. They will help you to survive!

🔨 Build and upgrade your raft
Expand, develop and protect your raft. If you need more place, build a first floor!

📜 Lot’s of crafting recipes
Fish, cook and collect drinking water. Craft building materials, clothes, weapons, chests and other necessary things to survive!

🚣 Solve the puzzle of an endless ocean
What happened in this apocalyptic world? Why are people destined to live in the ocean. Training and quest system help you to find answers and escape.

🌗 Great plans
We carefully examine all proposals according our favorite game improving. We’ll add dynamic Day-Night Cycle and weather condition, exciting plot, underwater world and other interesting events in the future updates!

Find out more advantages of the app:

🌊 VARIABLE WORLDS OF RAFT SURVIVAL
Each of survival adventure games has its own world with unique difficulties and challenges. Our survivor simulator generates unlimited numbers of worlds. Explore Pacific islands, reefs, and bottomless ocean trenches in raft games free!
No two worlds are alike: you can generate completely new and randomized world at any time in the survival free.

🌊 CLOSE TO REAL-LIFE EXPERIENCE
Raft survival free is a 3D game designed to give survival games free lovers the closest to real life gameplay. That’s why Day-Night Cycle was added. Survivor app has treacherous weather conditions that allow to enjoy sunny days and beware of stormy ones. If you’d like to get new skills in survive games, try raft games!

🌊 YOUR LIFE IS IN YOUR HANDS
Raft building games offer the chance to craft new weapons and equipments. Search for shipwreck parts and improve your raft in survival escape. Craft a spear and protect yourself from murderous sharks that follow you everywhere.

Bearing in mind all these qualities of build and survive games, you’d not forget about your health status in the harsh conditions. Fishing and hunting is the only way to succeed and not to starve to death in raft survival in the ocean.

RAFT: Original Survival Game features:
• 3D interface of raft free
• Realistic experience of survival base building games
• Complex and amazing challenges of survivor games free

Let your brain work at high speed and do everything within your power to win in one of the survival apps! If you want to go on raft craft survival games and turn it into an adventure of a lifetime, then play RAFT: Original Survival Game.

Join our social networking site and take part in expecting updates discussions and offer your ideas to improve the game!
Make screenshots, record videos, share your achievements with other players!

👉Our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/RaftOriginal/
