comments: The game is alright, but I  have some frustrations with it. For one, sometimes when you release the ball, the aim will move suddenly and cause it to hit off of your intend target. Also, it isn't cool when you start a new level and you have no available moves (you can't pop any bubbles! ), Sometimes for a number of turns, sometimes in the middle or at the end of the level. Usually it is manageable enough. Still frustrating tho. Maybe it is an international challenge of the game..  Overall a decent game

Uninstalling. The controls are imprecise (ball would slip off the desired direction occasionally) and the order of the colours would make it impossible to win on occasion. I can forgive the first thing (muscle) but making it impossible to win is not forgivable.  Work on the algorithm.

I used to enjoy this game when I had a minute spare. I was cruising at around level 300 enjoy the simplicity of it but not anymore! Since the introduction of the "ice" balls, it's become near impossible. Reading the other comment I'm glad to see that others are frustrated with the aim moving right at the last minute. I had this at 5 stars now it's 1.

Games really nice good mind challenge, great for color match making if color blind. You may not know what colors your matching however, ever since i started playing i've also been getting better at matching my clothes and random day to day organising of colored items. Love the game however the ball simetimes seems to go where it wants to instead of where you released it... I noticed this a few times i would aim let go and the line would randomly jump to a new spot and the ball shots almost a completely diffrent location

It is a good game but is built to take $$.  There are some levels that will not let you pass without spending $$ which I refuse to do.   I understand the need to make $$, but when it is blatantly built to take money, that is where I have an issue.  I wish I could upload the video of the level this takes place in, then you would understand what I mean. Decent game but sad for the obvious reason for the game.
Best goddamn game I've ever played, most amazing graphics in the entire gaming world! I'm thinking of naming my next kid Power Pop. I didn't believe in God until I discovered this life changing game.
description: Start your engines and get ready to shoot and pop all the electric bubbles until you clear the screen. Solve the fun puzzles and challenges to level up and advance along the silver map. Download for free from Google Play and join the electric factory fun with bubble shooter. Pop bubbles and explore over hundreds awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups and features.- Make 7 shots in a row to earn a fireball that will burn up bubbles on the way.- Drop 10 bubbles or more and get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.Cool FeaturesAddictive gameplay. Play and enjoy hours of endless fun. Hundreds of incredible levels packed with fun puzzles and challenges. Bubble swap is free, simply tap on your bubble to change its colorAwesome graphics and effectsPlaying our game is easy, just follow these instructions: Drag your finger to move the laser aiming and lift it to shoot bubbles. You have to match at least 3 bubbles of the same color or more to pop the group and win points. Aim and pop bubbles to win levels. Remember: the fewer shots you use to complete a level, the higher score you‚Äôll get and the chance to earn 3 stars on every level. So warm up your fingers and start working on those matching skills.
descriptionHTML:

comments: This is a great game... You should play it if you like gymnastics and if you are board,You   should download this game... Is very fun... I liked it... But it still needs a bit more to improve.. I would love it even more if you had more stuff.. And if you didnt had to pay for anything  at all.. Also, please just open the spa and the other stuff you cant get unless you pay!

This is from my daughter, "I like the game but there's some things about it I kind of don't understand. Some of the controls are a little difficult like the one where you have to tap 1 or tap 2 when she's practicing. And its fun. Some of it I like a lot."   This is from me, "the app is annoying until you buy it. It downloaded a ton of icons (ads for other games) to my picture gallery without informing me. My daughter likes the game a lot and it's fun, but a bit intrusive with the free version. The gameplay is good overall."

I love the game but there should be coins so you can by the beam vault and all the other stuff , not with real money and the beam and vault always says coming sone so if you can update that would be amazing and if you could let me know that would be good.

It's a cool game, it just could be better and maybe there could be some other things in the update. Don't take it seriously! I'm not trying to be mean but maybe there could be some other leotards and the update and some more hair dues because all of those buns and people may not like that's just buns people may want the braids that you always have in your other games. I mean the French braids and they keep going down into a braid, all those things would be nice!
Still waiting for an update to get the other two activities for the gymnastics   How long to you expect us to wait, some of us have paid money on this   Please hurry up and get it updated please

Really was enjoying this app, then about 10 minutes in video ads started popping in literally every 1 or 2 minutes. This totally killed the fun factor; not only was I unable to complete any tasks or just enjoy the game but the crummy ads actually kept booting me off the app. What a complete buzz kill; even tho this app was super cute & the graphics were total eye candy, the constant interruptions barging in were beyond ridiculous; both in longevity & frequency.
description: All your hard work has finally paid off - you‚Äôve made it to the Olympics! Now‚Äôs your chance to dress up in dazzling aerobic gymnast leotards and represent your country with pride! Work on your amazing gymnast moves until they're ready for the Olympics. Practice makes perfect! Compete your way to that shiny GOLD medal! Keep your eye on the prize!WOW. Your dream has come true. You‚Äôve finally reached the Olympics, and you get to compete against world-class gymnasts to win gold for your country. Train with a famous coach who has helped other Olympic gold medalists reach the top. Perfect your aerobic gymnastics moves and win this year's major Gymnastics Competition in the Olympics! Get ready to dress up like a star - you‚Äôll need a lot of practice and dedication, and you can even come up with your very own gymnastics routine, choreographed by YOU!Features:> Compete for your country in the Olympics & climb the world aerobic gymnastics ranks! Make that gold medal yours! > Perfect your uneven bar routine and floor exercises!  > Get ready for the biggest gymnastics competition of the year, with an Olympic "coach to the stars!"> Dress up is always fun, but gymnastics dress up is the best! descriptionHTML:
All your hard work has finally paid off - you’ve made it to the Olympics! Now’s your chance to dress up in dazzling aerobic gymnast leotards and represent your country with pride! Work on your amazing gymnast moves until they're ready for the Olympics. Practice makes perfect! Compete your way to that shiny GOLD medal! Keep your eye on the prize!

WOW. Your dream has come true. You’ve finally reached the Olympics, and you get to compete against world-class gymnasts to win gold for your country. Train with a famous coach who has helped other Olympic gold medalists reach the top. Perfect your aerobic gymnastics moves and win this year's major Gymnastics Competition in the Olympics! Get ready to dress up like a star - you’ll need a lot of practice and dedication, and you can even come up with your very own gymnastics routine, choreographed by YOU!

Features:
> Compete for your country in the Olympics & climb the world aerobic gymnastics ranks! Make that gold medal yours!
> Perfect your uneven bar routine and floor exercises!
> Get ready for the biggest gymnastics competition of the year, with an Olympic "coach to the stars!"
> Dress up is always fun, but gymnastics dress up is the best! Dress up in a glittery, fantastic gymnastics leotard that will make you stand out!
> Get creative and come up with your very own aerobic gymnastics routine!
> Look like a real star gymnast! Get a makeover, a manicure, and a new hairstyle!
> Hit the gym & get in shape before the competition!
> OMG! Golden Gymnast magazine just asked you to be on their cover! Photo shoot, here you come!
> Impress the judges with stellar aerobic gymnastics moves like side aerials, triple full layouts, triple pikes, backward rolls & more!
> Ugh - gymnastics injury. No worries - the doctor will treat you in time for the big competition!
> Relax at the spa before the big day. You deserve it after all that hard work!

About Coco Play
Coco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading, global creator of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.

comments: Love love love it solo much, it made to the top ten best games in my head! It has more items but mixing some items don't really make  sense like Domestication and grass makes wheat that is one item that don't make sense otherwise you can cheat from little alchemy 1 so yeah 55 star from me!

This is a very entertaining game that is simple to play. It has provided me with hours of fun! The only thing is that I wish there were more combinations, there are things I've tried that you'd think would make something but don't. For example, Crayon (or Pencil, or Charcoal, or Paint) + Paper does not make Art.

Huge, glaring problem: once I create obsidian for the first time, I can't create it again. It doesn't show up in the table of ingredients on the right hand side. Searching for it in the search bar reveals it doesn't seem to exist. When I try to combine the ingredients to make obsidian, the game basically says, "yep that's how you make obsidian" without actually making any.

I love this game. At first time I open it after download, it still okay. But after that, at second day I open the app, my phone will be turned off immediately. I try to uninstall it and just redownload today, but still same. My phone keep turned off if I open the app. Please fix this, I really really want to play :(

This game is pretty addicting. I get stuck sometimes but I always find something new.  Small issue though, I it won't let me pull rust out onto the screen for some reason. I've used it before, but now it won't let me use it anymore. Perhaps it is an issue with my phone rather than a glitch in the app.

This is leagues better than the original alchemy game. There were a lot of bugs but they've all more or less been patched out. It took me 2 months of playing everyday to get all of the items and combinations cleared.

comments: A truly fun, interesting & free game. A good game for any age. If you need to do something relaxing, this is a good way. You'll get hooked!!! I'm in the 500's & it's still fun! The ads only require 1 more touch on the screen than you have been doing. Well worth it.

Great game, Love it! Very creative, fantastic graphics. Not so difficult or loss of life's to where you can't even play.  Yet still challenging.  Only negative is lots of ads. Would gladly pay nominal fee to get rid of them.

I hate the fact that one can't enjoy the game. So many advertising ads keep popping up one right after the other. Interrupting you while your playing the game. It's so annoying & fusterating. The game itself is Awesome but with all these stupid ads in the way. One gets feedup.

Love it !!! Caught my eye when I saw "pick 2" vs. pick 3. I'm a stay at home mom kids in school 6 days week that gives me time to burn   (lol) They did a couple small tweeks which  made the "typical pick 3 concept"a thing of the past (FINALLY) BUT WAS ENOUGH change to make it a keeper

Not a clue if there's a story line, how the power ups work, the difference between the levels or what the deal with the chest is BUT it a cute fun game to pass the time with and relax with. It's challenging but I've yet to get completely and frustratingly stuck. This feels like a game designed for fun not to make money though "buying lives"

This is a rip off of toy blast!  Peak Games went after hashbro MLP Puzzle party for ripping off the gameplay of toy blast by peak games. I am pissed off that they went after hashbro but not other knock offs. I liked MLP Puzzle Party this game is so boring. Not only they ripped off peak games they ripped off the music from Genies and Gems from Jam City. I will uninstall!

It`s completely free.Candy Legend is easy to play, but it is plenty of fun and surprise.How to play - Just tap on the same color blocks to crush them. descriptionHTML:
Candy Legend is a funny and lovely match-2 game. It`s completely free.

Candy Legend is easy to play, but it is plenty of fun and surprise.

How to play - Just tap on the same color blocks to crush them. Tap on 5 more blocks to generate a new candy which has a special skill!

There is a nice booster system, which supports you to solve any problem you meet in the game. By the way, the booster is also free.

One more thing, you can play the game at anywhere anytime，internet is not necessary for it.

Game features:
1. Be friendly to ladies
2. Completely free
3. Easy to play but very interesting
4. Wonderful gaming experience
5. 900+ levels
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
summary: Candy Legend is a funny and lovely match-2 game. It`s completely free.
title: Candy Legend

comments: I Personally would like to have the ability to upgrade stars on heroes easier without spending real money. Get 2 to 3 stars on the characters for free leaves me wanting, and im just not spending money on a game like this. Otherwise it is a fun game. Even though it basically can be a full time job you dont make money on and have to spend money on. So if you dont mind commiting months to barely make it to do the late game stuff amd still have to spend months to progress. This game will be great. This review is for those who play ftp games without actually paying to win.

So it's kinda fun but I'm rating it low based on the cost of purchasing character shards versus how many you get. I tested it out and purchased a ton of purple diamond things and purchased character shards that gives between 5 and 330. Out of 7 purchases at 1299 each, I got a total of 41 shards. So for roughly 9100 diamonds, I get 41 shards. You do the math. This game apparently enjoys taking your money. I've mentioned this to the developers with no reply. DC Legends knows what they're doing when it comes to purchases of character shards. At least they make it easier

I love this game but an issue im having since the newest update os why im giving 2 stars at the moment. Ever since the update the game will not load. Says "loading cantina" then closes the app completely. Im gonna end up getting kicked out of my guild...please fix this! Soon as its fixed it will return it to 5 stars bc the overall game is badass!

Very addictive. I started playing casually, and 4 weeks later I find myself checking it all the time. It's best played with at least a minor investment, but reasonably ftp...if you got patience.  Add: it's been six months, and I'm still hammering away at it. It has a huge base of fans,and I've only needed customer support once (and they handled my issue very well and quickly).  Still a bit grind-y, but great little bit of clicky gaming.

The game is fun enough but to sync it with your Google account to have to give your phone and all its abilities to EA. Why is there a need for the game to access my photos and make and answer calls? How 'bout I play a game on my phone with cool light sabers and fun music and when I need to make a call I'll stop for a bit. Just let people play and EA can make bank with their microtransactions. GTFO of people's personal info.

Great way to spend down time at work or at home. Really enjoy playing as characters from both light and dark side teaming up and defeating others. It does take awhile to get charcters leveled up. However can spend some money if you don't want to grind. However I find it rewarding grinding each day to get what i want.
description: ‚ÄúVisually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars‚Ñ¢ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.‚Äù ‚Äì USA Today"The best Star Wars‚Ñ¢ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." ‚Äì GamezeboLive your Star Wars‚Ñ¢ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars‚Ñ¢: The Force Awakens, Rogue One‚Ñ¢: A Star Wars‚Ñ¢ Story and Star Wars‚Ñ¢: The Last Jedi‚Ñ¢. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAMRebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It‚Äôs your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars‚Ñ¢ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXYDefeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes‚Äô abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONSMake smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker‚Äôs Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin‚Äôs Reckless Assault, and others.ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLESCollect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDSLead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comGame EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days‚Äô notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
descriptionHTML:
“Visually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars™ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.” – USA Today

"The best Star Wars™ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." – Gamezebo

Live your Star Wars™ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, Rogue One™: A Star Wars™ Story and Star Wars™: The Last Jedi™. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAM
Rebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It’s your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars™ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!

BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXY
Defeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes’ abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.

PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker’s Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin’s Reckless Assault, and others.

ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLES
Collect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!

RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDS
Lead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.

Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.com

Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/

Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges: Get excited ‚Äì everything you love just got better! Now you can:
‚Ä¢ Earn the right to multi-sim Galactic War and Ship Challenges
‚Ä¢ Receive bonus banners based on combat performance in Territory Wars
‚Ä¢ View which Territory War defensive squads were most successful
‚Ä¢ Search for units by name when selecting your squad
‚Ä¢ Set inactive units as favorites and search favorites easier
‚Ä¢ Link accounts to play between Android and iOS devices
‚Ä¢ View an improved ‚ÄúRaids Ticket (Daily)‚Äù leaderboard
summary: Collect and battle with iconic heroes to become the top hologamer in the galaxy!
title: Star Wars‚Ñ¢: Galaxy of Heroes

comments: Don't like this game anymore. Been playing for 10 minutes this last time and have had more then 4 trailer park boys ad's and 3 other ads. Trying to play a game and get an ad ever few minutes isn't fun. Uninstalling

It's a great and addictive game, only downside is that there's just way too many unnecessary ads!  Like I need to watch an ad for a fortune soon, but as soon as I watched it it won't let me spin until I've watch another and another. Very frustrating.
Starting to get more adds popping up on my screen. And the game keeps bothering me to upgrade the "midas tap." Ain't wasting any more gems on it anymore.

I've spent little over a thousand diamonds for golden tickets. I used those tickets to upgrade my game. But now it's all gone. I had one business on platinum, but it's not there anymore. It disappeared after I reset for the bizbot upgrade. What's the point of spending so many resources when it's going to disappear later? One star rating and uninstalling. This ridiculous.

This game is great, but when i go back on it after being off it for a bit usually when I select anything It will freeze and I'll have to restart and it will work again. Also sometimes when the loading icon comes up at the top left it will just keep loading and won't allow me to do anything until it stops loading which after me waiting for it to stop which it didn't I had to restart.
Dont bother doing the free gem rewards, finished one and provided proof it was complete on 18/02/18 still waiting on tapjoy to take action, dont offer rewards if you dont honor them when completed

comments: Awesome game. just a few comments. you guys should have the stuff that's automatically generated (mining for example) running in the background even while the app is closed because otherwise you're just getting maybe 100 every now and then and you feel like you're getting nothing. would be nice for the money that comes every minute to also still run even while the app is off

I can't sing this game's praises enough. No death by ads or even annoying ads (there are some btw), plenty of resource freebies especially healthy amounts of in game currency (which some upgrades rely on), it's hours of fun. I would like better explanations behind some things, like where are these workers I'm supposed to capture on the world map or what are the worlds.
Had this game a day. Now it's unplayable. Stuck on a "gift" level where I have to find a hero. Can exit out of the screen and now a 40 minute cool down period. Now unplayable.

It's great game and I have a few suggestions when you join a guild sometimes I instantly get 7 million the first time I joined a guild my castle was only level 25 then I was donated 4.5 million gold and I instantly upgraded my castle to level 200 so what I'm saying here is that the higher level your castle is the more money can be donated

i already have an account but when i will load it to my new phone it says "cannot find the game data in the server" please fix this. i dont want to restart from the very first level :(((  ill give 5 stars if i can get my account back

comments: Game is fun until you get so far and can no longer upgrade to compete.  I have all stars in amateur league, yet on achievement rewards it shows I only have 1 star.  This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

First up the images used as what the game looks like are fakes. I saw too many polygons.... (Shudder) Secondly there is no start menu. NOPE! Just some fancy loading screen and boom you're in the game without a chance to look at the controls. Plus your first mission is ruined by the tutorial at the worst places on the track.   Bad game knockoff. If you download this just delete it. This game is [EXPLICATIVE]

Good time waster. Especially well made in the beginning levels, but quickly becomes pay to win, as diamonds are not easily attainable and neither are coins, not to mention that later cars are very high prices and require much dedication to acquire. Controls are nice, but like with money, get worse with time. Maps are not optimized for later leveled cars, making some corners physically impossible to make even when drifting at full tilt, forcing the player to adapt to a combination of drifting, boosting and then braking to get around a bend without crashing. Otherwise, it is a very nice game for being free, although there are many ads, but that's excusable as it is a free game. I would recommend it, just not as a long term type of game.

Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

Update: so I've been playing for several weeks now. You cannot win with maxed out mods, racing the same level cars. They're twice as fast and you can only knock off 3 cars at the beginning of the race and you're unable to catch with others. Even if you spend money, you will not get 1st place in a lot of the races. Very unbalanced game. Whoever programmed the ai should be fired  Fun game, but the intrusive ads are ridiculous. It pops up in the middle of a race, before and after the race, finished off by asking you to pay to remove ads.

I don't know what the game is even like. I couldn't even get past the loading part because it won't let me tap on the screen.  I find this very irritating because I like trying out new car games. But please promise me you won't play this game any further as its a waste of your time.

Great game! Very addicting & its just like your being a real robber & make the people don't catch you, i like it when they investigating open doors & when they hear the dog bark because its like its realistic. Please add more Levels & make many characters not just Bob. Thank you. .

description: Introducing the Man of Steal‚Ä¶ Play as Bob, the hapless burglar intent on changing his ways. Unfortunately for Bob, however, he's going to be forced into a few final jobs before he's allowed out of the criminal life. ‚Ä¢ SUPER SNEAKY Sneak past security guards, residents and sleeping bulldogs as you recover the loot in each stage. Use your ninja-like skills to hide in some tight squeezes and avoid detection. ‚Ä¢ THERE GOES THE NEIGHBORHOOD Your sticky-fingered missions will take you through a local neighbourhood, Downtown, and even through some secret labs. Can you get a perfect on every one? ‚Ä¢ LOOT YOUR HEART OUT Bob is going to have to pinch everything from secret documents, to old pairs of clothes, to those always hard-to-find TV remotes! ‚Ä¢ CRIME IS A FUNNY OLD GAME Get engrossed in the comical storyline featuring hilarious animations, a fun script and a genuinely twisting narrative.

comments: Now these days, to be powerful is cards. And it's really sad to see it in one of my favorite fighting game. I have a galaxy s8 plus and when I put the controls on large, it feels like there on medium. If your playing duel and your opponent has 5 power points ahead of you, just call it a lost. Do better. Battlefront 2 is about to be banned in Germany because of the card system. I hope you look into it.  Edited: it's still the same. It feels like a pay to win. I'm going back to shadow fight 2. You know. The good one.

I really like playing the game. It has great animations smooth gameplay and isn't too easy or hard. The one thing I dont like is you can't sell your old equipment or skills. If there was a shop to sell them or add runes to them or be able to combine them to make either new or more powerful ones of the sane type I would give this game 5 stars.hopefully the Devs will take this and add this feature in a update. Speaking of updates, I just installed the latest one it was like 403MB but nothing changed! What was the update for then?

Hey NEKKI i have the best suggestion ever. WHY DON'T YOU add a grab button separately or at least give the option. Also make the side quest more satisfying. Just giving me commons just isn't going to work. Please nerf the herlad faction. 1 its crit chance is to stupidly high 17 percent is to much. Its also so quick and has long range

Would be great if there were a better sign in feature. I had to restore factory settings on my phone... Now the game won't allow me to log into my account. Which sucks a lot, I have spent money on microtransactions and a bit of time into leveling up. But now that seems to be all gone...

The game is a lot of fun but there's one big problem the only way to advance in the story mode is by leveling up and getting better armor but the only way to level up is in story mode so your other option is spend real money on better equipment. So it's kinda just a money grab. If that was fixed I'd give it 10 stars

The only good thing about this game is graphic and animation. Beautiful and smooth. But how about the Gameplay? Yuck! Lack of contents. Story goes nowhere. After several duel, you didnt gain anything. Which mean it stops you from progressing to follow the story. The only way to progress is spend money. There is even no option to delete/sell common chest or gear. In short, uninstall and find another game.
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

comments: Most puzzles are self explanatory. The odd few appeared to be impossible without some instruction. Few levels I had to skip probably around 7 levels. Couple due to pieces not moving or stuck. Very happy to be able to skip levels.  Would have been great to have a certain bank of hints for some of the  difficult ones. I found the later levels easier than the ones around 100. Max levels 120. Great fun!

Not responsive to most touches. I finally got a cheat only to realize it was the game.  Ads were not frequent but had a strobe light going off (health issues) and would not turn off. Had to close out of the game every time so I just quit playing. Typo many similar more challenging games out there to try and work with this one.

Some things are hidden in such a place makes it hard on note 8 due to curved screen. Level 89 doesn't work, as well as other levels where touching the same place over and over and over might get something to work.  Most puzzles are extremely easy,  it's just a matter of the game not working.

Good concept but a lot of the puzzles are stupid or they totally don't work unless you restart the game which is annoying. There's so many glitches I felt like uninstalling so many times! I'm just glad it's over so i can get rid of this app. 3/10 wouldn't recommend
Fun and challenging for awhile, but I found most of the levels after 50 impossible to figure out without a cheat sheet. Got frustrating. I'm at level 60 and about ready to throw in the towel.

I play this game in 2hrs and got stuck on level 42. It's challenge your mind. It's good for you, if you like doing brain games.. It helps you think about.. Like you really have to think about it or you will get stuck. But all the above, it's a awesome awesome game.

descriptionHTML:
A world on your mobile™ - Over 70,000,000 people are playing! Get the top rated match 3 puzzle adventure game FREE! Enter the world of Minutia and collect cute characters - Level up your team to defeat the Slugs - and play more than 1500 levels for hours of fiendish match 3 fun!

STORY:
The little creatures of Minutia lived in peace and harmony, until the night the meteor smashed into Mount Boom! A strange force transformed the slimy Slugs who lived there into a gang of greenery-gobbling goons – and now, the Slugs captured the Best Fiends’ families!

To fight back the Slugs and free their families, the Best Fiends must go on on an adventure! Level up and discover their special powers and prepare for the mystery that awaits at Mount Boom.

To get to Mount Boom, they’ll need to become… the BEST FIENDS!

I thought this game was fun UNTIL it said you had to WAIT FOR MORE QUESTS!  This happened after each completion of an enclosure...very frustrating!  Have been waiting two days, so far, for a new enclosure quest:(  Not very professional!

This game is ridiculous.   Have to do games to get things and then when you open up to get animals youbthen have to play multiple games to get items to expand or play or train.  Way too much and only get 5 lives for all the different games you are forced to play.

The game is enjoyable but I don't care for the new animated Charlotte. Instead of adding "realism", she is simply annoying. Other than that, it's fairly good. The number of coins needed to continue a level with 5 extra moves is a bit much compared to the number received when you complete the level (300 vs 25-30 or so). I understand, though. It can't be too easy or else it would be boring & nobody would ever spend any $ to advance!üòÅ

descriptionHTML:
Build a zoo, play with cute animals and solve match 3 puzzles - all in one game!

Switch between the challenge of the match 3 levels, and the joy of welcoming a new furry friend to the zoo you built with your hands.

The Family Zoo was once the gem of the neighborhood. Now, the city wants to build a huge supermarket instead. It’s time to burst their bubble!

Solve casual match three puzzles to earn tickets and materials. Then, restore the zoo and decorate the animal habitats and surrounding gardens.

Meet new and old friends, and work together to make sure all the animals have a place to live. They are counting on you - can you save their home?

Game Features
✿ Swap between match 3 levels and building your own zoo!
✿ Hundreds of delicious and challenging match 3 puzzles
✿ Choose from thousands of decorations to make your family zoo unique!
✿ Interact with exotic and cute animals
✿ Develop your business with stands, cafes and other attractions to draw visitors and earn coins!
✿ Complete quests for more rewards and advancing the story
✿ Make friends with characters that will help you save the zoo
✿ Enhance your fun with exploding watermelons and other wacky boosters
developerAddress:
Plarium LLC
075 Creekside Drive, Suite 100
Portage, MI 49024
United States
recentChanges: Hmm... Looks like we miss some animals in your new Asian location... Guess whom? That's right - red pandas!  Hurry up to prepare the best cosy home for them and enjoy these cuties! New match-3 levels and quests are already waiting for you!
summary: Crush Match 3 Puzzles, Complete Fun Quests and Save the Animals!
title: Family Zoo: The Story

comments: The movement and the ability to delete structures for refund could be better. Trading HQ could be so much better, my main concern are the loading screens. Perhaps instead of loading the whole city a separate map viewer could be opened that shows general statistics and layout but not the entire city. That way trading could be done faster between cities and there would be more involvement with the trading community. As it stands its a real chore and is deterring me from trading as much as I'd like. Another idea is if the stock market could be integrated somehow. I think that would be cool, and it would add an element of realism.

Thanks for new upgrade . Even when the game was slow i didn't stop playing. I love this game. It's not only a game for me...i am a President of my club and i have to lead my members... in less than one year i reached level 50 and almost all land expanded...just  you have to understand how to play... be smart... some advice for beginners  start participate in mayor competition...this way you will grow faster

This game is crazy addictive. But it's way too easy to accidentally spend sim cash when you don't want to. I save religiously and in half a second my finger brushes the wrong button and cash is gone just like that. Really disheartening.  Again I just accidentally spent sim cash. A lot of it and it took me months to save it. I think I'm officially done with this game.

By a stroke of luck I got my old game back in February 2018 after a span of a year and a month. Good to be back. A suggestion : why don't you have something like a banking system wherein you can exchange the different currencies in play in the game. There could be a selling price and a purchase price which gives the bank a margin

Great game. But what I miss are written below.   1. Direct search & contact any city.   2. Invite a city to be friend from within game.   3. Direct private message with a city from within Game.   4. Make a city tagged as favourite city or liked city.   5. Want a clean viewing mode of own city without those construction hats and other info symbols on top of  building being constructed.  I think they are massively missed. And if you can provide these facilities then it will be the best game of it's class.

Addictive & fun.  In a perfect world: more land expansion is needed. Also, variable prices at the GTHC based on scarcity would be better than fixed ones based on difficulty to produce.  One important thing.  There is premium currency in this game.  It's very easy to accidentally spent it, as there is no confirm button on premium currency purchases.  Fix this and will give 5-stars again
description: Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own city as you design and create a beautiful, bustling metropolis. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger and more intricate. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. Then trade, chat, compete, and join clubs with fellow Mayors. Build your way to extraordinary with the most popular city builder on mobile!BRING YOUR CITY TO LIFEBuild skyscrapers, parks, landmarks, factories, and much more! Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. Solve real-life challenges like traffic, fires, and pollution. Provide services like power plants and police departments, and boost your population with parks and education. Keep traffic moving with grand avenues and streetcars. Take on fun challenges to shape your society.PUT YOUR IMAGINATION ON THE MAPExpand along the beach with a marina, waterpark, and luxury beachfront. Build a Tokyo-style neighborhood and unlock exclusive landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Statue of Liberty. Discover innovative technologies with Future Cities and get athletic with sports stadiums. Hit the town with Las Vegas buildings and go Hollywood with movie studios. There‚Äôs always something new and different to make your city unique.BATTLE YOUR WAY TO VICTORYCompete in real-time PvP with Club Wars, where you strategize with Mayor‚Äôs Club members and declare war on other cities. Once the battle is on, unleash crazy disasters on opponents, like the Disco Twister and Plant Monster, to do damage and watch the wreckage happen live. Earn disaster cards, SimCash, and other valuables to use in battle or to improve your city. Also, take on other players in the Contest of Mayors. Complete weekly challenges and climb the ranks to advance through Leagues. Become a top Mayor and get rewards that can upgrade and beautify your city.CONNECT AND TEAM UPJoin a Mayor‚Äôs Club to trade supplies with other members and chat about strategies and available resources. Collaborate to help someone complete their personal vision and get support to complete yours. Build big, work together, lead other Mayors, and watch your city come to life!-------User Agreement: terms.ea.com/enPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/en Visit https://help.ea.com/en/ for assistance or inquiries. comments: I play this game regularly, and I enjoy the differing modes available. You can play happily without paying for any additional content, however at higher levels paying will help you progress. By this time you will have poured hours into it, so I do not think it is unreasonable. Save your gold until later levels (player level 15+) and you can get by without in game purchases for quite a while.

I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.

I like this game, but the reason I'm giving it a 2 star rating because the game can't load. After the first time I played it, when I went to play it again it froze. I've been waiting at the game to load for like 5 minutes and decided that the game was broken. Can I get help, I might change my rating.

Great time waster. Wish the gas would increase quicker. Hero's are pretty easy to get after a while. Freemium aspects of the game not shoved down your throat they are there but not essential (So far) LVL 25

descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

comments: This is a great game with good ideas. Don't listen to those people who say it's bad as its not. There are some flaws, mainly in the fact that there are only a few maps so more maps would be nice. Also, it would be nice if you could change the name or if there is a way, tell me. There are other slightly bad things but overall a great game.

Great concept the only thing wrong with it is the slow movement's that happens some Times during the game hope  that you all fix it. Another thing is the lack of stages there are only four to three stages and all of them are with ice add more and I guarantee your that your ratings is going to rise. Finally the option to change your name at the main screen and better control's than just jumping. Would love to play it once these issues are fixed and I don't mean to be harsh hope you all got my opinions

The graphics are perfect for the style, but attacks should be more under your contract with weapons, and variation without. I also can't find the Bluetooth multiplayer hinted by the Bluetooth connection permissions. Is that a later feature? If so please add soon!

This game is good awful DO NOT INSTALL. The graphics are the only decent thing in this game and they are ripped off of the real game. The controls rarely work. The ads are always in the way. The AI's are OP and there is no point in playing the game. Its a much better idea to just buy the real game on steam instead. 100x better

Why use your own creative ideas when you can rip it off of an actual game that's fun and worth your time? Either I'm tripping or the play store has extremely low expectations and will welcome even the most crappy and unoriginal game the world has ever seen, cause that's what it is.
I like it. But there are things that could be better. Like changing the names. Actually online players not bots. More customizable characters.

descriptionHTML:
Slope Down: First Trip - it's a huge descent with a high speed through the green plains and cliffs. Arcade where you have to find out a Crystal and save the World from a coming disaster. Pick up your sphere and let's start the trip! A beautiful journey is waiting for you!

INTERESTING GAMEPLAY

SHOW WHO IS THE BEST

descriptionHTML:
🎹Piano by Gismart is an electric keyboard simulator app with virtual musical instruments to help you learn chords and music notes for free! Learn how to play the piano keys in many interesting ways! 👍

The only realistic piano and musical instruments learning app with free songs made by musicians for musicians and beginners! Download right now and learn to play the piano keyboard on your Phone or Tablet for free!

Our digital Piano app lets you choose sounds from a number of music instruments: from a grand and fortepiano, to the violin, harpsichord, accordion, organ and guitar. Carve out original melodies and record them to play back via different musical instruments. You can also share your musical creations on social media, including Creatubbles, a safe sharing place for children and adults.

You’ll learn various chords and how to read sheet music, taking you on your journey to become a virtual piano player and maestro!

Here’s more:
Enjoy our cool mini games and start playing the piano without any lessons. Perform famous songs by tapping keys under falling tiles in the Magic Tiles game. Improve your sense of timing and tempo by tapping random white and black keys in the Magic Keys.

★★★ Piano app features ★★★
✔ Full 88 key piano keyboard;
✔ Magic Tiles and Magic Keys mini games;
✔ 9 Different piano keyboards and musical instruments: Piano keyboard, Grand Piano, Organ, Harpsichord, Accordion, Electric Guitar, Harp, Cello Pizzicato, Vintage piano;
✔ Single or Dual scrollable keyboard;
✔ Free piano songs;
✔ Popular and classic piano songs;
✔ Piano record feature - record and share your plays;
✔ Piano HD.

About Gismart
Gismart is a team of devoted musicians and developers with real passion for music and everything about it!
Find out more about us: gismart.com
Follow us on https://www.facebook.com/gismartmusic/
Feel free to drop us a line about anything: info@gismart.com

description: Sling, bounce and swing your Kong to glory, but watch out for all manner of dastardly traps and obstacles. Go up, and up, and up until there‚Äôs no more up to go, or else meet your hilarious end!Join Chimp, Pig, Jellyfish and over 140 other crazy and colorful characters as you challenge your friends to become the best Kong Slinger around.Now you can even take a selfie and create your very own Kong! Create Kongs of your friends and family and dress them up with fun accessories! There are thousands of combinations!Sling Kong requires the following phone permissions:Storage - This will allow you to share images from the game.Approximate Location - Allows the game to show advertisements that are more relevant to you.Camera and Record Audio - Allows you to take photos and record audio to customise your Kongs.
descriptionHTML:
Sling, bounce and swing your Kong to glory, but watch out for all manner of dastardly traps and obstacles. Go up, and up, and up until there’s no more up to go, or else meet your hilarious end!

Join Chimp, Pig, Jellyfish and over 140 other crazy and colorful characters as you challenge your friends to become the best Kong Slinger around.

Now you can even take a selfie and create your very own Kong! Create Kongs of your friends and family and dress them up with fun accessories! There are thousands of combinations!

Sling Kong requires the following phone permissions:
Storage - This will allow you to share images from the game.
Approximate Location - Allows the game to show advertisements that are more relevant to you.
Camera and Record Audio - Allows you to take photos and record audio to customise your Kongs.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Planet Gold Rush!

Grab your gear, Young Buck, there's gold in them hills just waitin' for you! Strike it rich in this fun-filled gold mining game where you can explore and survey gold-rich lands, pull the gold from the earth, wash it, and make GOLD BARS! This is more than just mining, this is an adventure - and its CHOCK full of GOLD!

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Planet Gold Rush is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.

comments: Has to be one of the worst games I habe played. Iaay here for about a half hour figuring stuff out and the only upgrades are for real money .and their are adds every time you do anything pretty tap any button . these 5 star votes are clearly bots. 1/10 do not recommend.

This is that type of game where you can either be paitent or rush it by wasting ur time. I have played the game by just opening it and letting the box fill up at 3,000 coins every hr and 20 mins. In the past 2 days i am currently at 30k coins. The game advertisement is false. Unless it has not updated for me yet. If you are just here to look at ads every time you like to get at most 300 coins or even 20. Then this is your game. It has no upgrade system unless, you are willing to pay actual cash for it. Which it is stupid. A $5 gift card is 4,500,000 coins. It might take you at least about 2 weeks to maybe get that. Good luck folks.

At the rate you get coins it would take youbabreally long time for you to redeem for five dollars, but the ads are not very intrusive, and the game works.  If I can get an extra 5. Bucks by the end of the month, I'm happy.
The amount of ads is truly ridiculous. And if you intend to actually make any money at all with this game you will have to play for probably over a year to make 1 dollar. don't waste your time

I like the mini games, but I don't like the small amount of money you get by the rate it goes it will take a good year before you can redeem anything. Also, there are too many ads. Other than those things the game itself and the graphics aren't badüòÄ.

Nice game it's nice to make a bit of money. But.. there are just to many ads. I do not have a nice and normal experience while using the app. If you can lower the ads it will be a good app. I uninstalled because the ads where way to annoying. Please lower the amount of ads. Thanks

Hey Chief,

Donald reporting for duty!

comments: I played this a while back and decided to come back and see if anything had changed and it sure did. There have been several updates that I love (the new maps, new sharks, equipment, etc.) and I'm glad I'm playing it now. In game currency price for items has been balanced out which I love and the missions system is much better now. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes progression-based time-killing games like Hungry Shark World.

This game is amazing! Everyone needs to play this. I would've given a fifth star however you need to not only buy all XXL sharks to unlock the "!!" Sharks but max them out. Definitely download this, just one tip. Don't delete when you have progress. I've downloaded, played, got bored, and deleted 3 times. Now I'm never deleting it. I have so much progress, if I never deleted it the first time I would have everything in the game

Favourite Shark game in the entire world. I became obsessed because it's so addictive and fun. The graphics are amazing, disappointed when I got my new phone I lost my progress even when I used the smart transfer to transfer the app. I've had to start all over again... but the fun continues!

Do not upgrade your Sharks.  The bigger the shark, the more difficult it is to play.  Big sharks have more drain on health and hunger, causing you to die more frequently. Impassable areas due to size of !! shark and less fishes to eat when health gets low.  Not to mention how slow these big sharks move!  The more you spend on bigger sharks, the less fun you'll have.

I've had to start this game all over from the very beginning 3 times. After working hard to get all the way to the top sharks, the app will suddenly refuse to connect to your Facebook account and want you to start a whole new game. Waste of time. Very frustrating. Not enjoyable at all. Find a game that's enjoyable. This one is definitely not fun.

This game is really addictive and i love it but i own everything now so I don't play anymore. I occasionally get on just to check for new stuff and they do put out new stuff but it takes a long, loooonggggg time. Please put new sharks out and don't make us wait foreverrrr!

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

Like the game on Facebook for the latest news: www.facebook.com/HungrySharkWorld
Follow us on Twitter @Hungry_Shark
Or Youtube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondon
And join our community!
Facebook http://facebook.com/UbisoftMobileGames
Twitter http://twitter.com/ubisoftmobile
Youtube http://youtube.com/user/Ubisoft

Any Feedback? Contact: http://support.ubi.com
Need support? Contact: http://support.ubi.com

UBISOFT MOBILE GAMES
38-42 rue Cuvier
93100 Montreuil Sous Bois
FRANCE

comments: I DONT LIKE THE UPDATE THAT GIVES YOU MORE TIME AFTER FORCE OF CARDS . IT ALLOWS PEOPLE WAYY!!!!! TO MUCH TIME TO COMPLETE THE BOARD. AND IT WAS MORE COMPETETIVE B4. I DONT WANT MY RANKING TO SUFFER BECAUSE OF LUCK.  +Ima a REAL RISK FAN. I have purchased everymap package available. Its fair priced and affordable.The new maps are too easy in my opinion. MAKE MORE MAPS I'LL PAY idc jus MAKE them MORE Challenging

Terrible. I looked up the rules for risk the defender defends with one less than the attacker,but on here they will do the exact same amount as u and will defend with two even though u have only one attacking. After that I tried the blitz thing and I lost 6 characters even though I had the advantage. Horrible game. Never going to plsyvthis game ever again.

This game is great but it could be so much better.   1. The expert AI is too easy to beat. Risk players normally gang up on an opponent, if they are dominating. There should be a legendary option.  2. It would be nice to have a match summary and timeline at the end of a game.    3. There should be an auto-save game feature when playing against the AI, in case the game drops out.  Edit: They seem to have addressed my third point.

The game was fun i paid for the full game, but after losing game after game because an army of 30 lost to an army of 4 or 5. Or it glitches and my whole army becomes the enemies, or someone turns into a computer and goes in an all out assult i get very frustrated. Risk is fun but so many glitches. Poorly run app with very little work given to it.

This is a very frustrating game. Every single time I play my turn (in a multi-player game that is) I get disconnected! .. and I've to replay it again .. only to get disconnected again! and so on and so on till my time runs out. Sometimes in the middle of all this 'replaying' I even lose my troops to other players .. VERY FRUSTRATING! And No .. I've both a very good data and wifi connections.

Was fine for a couple weeks.... Then it started freezing up in the middle of my games.... All of them. I'm using a LG V30+ with 128g ram so it's definitely not a lack of storage issue.   I wouldn't recommend this app to anyone who likes uninterrupted gameplay.

descriptionHTML:
NOW WITH FULL ONLINE MULTIPLAYER AND MATCHMAKING!

Everybody wants to rule the world! Now you can, with a new way to play the classic game of RISK. Play on your TV with Chromecast for the ultimate living room experience or take the battle online with Global Domination mode (must be over 13). Defend your territories, draft troops, and launch attacks for the ultimate conquest against friends, family, and foes. Try the game for free or unlock for unlimited mobile play!

NEW GLOBAL DOMINATION MODE
• Join or host battles against new opponents online
• Use Automatch mode to be pitted up against players of similar rank online
• Climb leaderboards & rank up to Grandmaster
• Additional achievements to earn

FEATURES
• Multiple game modes available: Global Domination online, Play Friends online, Single Player, and Pass & Play
• Up to 6 players/AIs can battle for world domination
• 4 difficulty settings for rookies and veterans
• Authentic rules – it’s the RISK you know and love
• Easily add friends and send challenges
• Guided tutorial mode and in-game help
• Critical game stats and achievements
• Multiple maps* and beautiful graphics
• Fun animated avatars
• Send secret alliance or coordinated attack requests to your fellow generals
• Send emojis to express your wrath or glee as you conquer your opponents

PLAY ON THE BIG SCREEN WITH CHROMECAST
• Connect to your TV with Chromecast and use your tablet or smartphone to control the action
• Chromecast device & network connection required for Play on TV mode
• Each player must have the RISK: Big Screen Edition app installed on their device

*extra maps and player avatars available for an additional cost

description: Space Rabbits in Space is an award winning, fully-fledged 2d platformer designed specifically for touch screens. No autorun and no virtual joysticks. Precise and highly responsive controls.Meet the Space Rabbits. Cute, fluffy bunnies from Space obsessed with speed and candies. Play with them through an adventure about betrayal, hard love and fun facts. With our new tap-based control system, you can move more freely, more precisely and faster than ever before - even faster than classic hardware controllers. It‚Äôs intuitive and easy to learn, hard to master... you know the drill. Play at your own pace or race against your friends or even the whole universe. It‚Äôs up to you.Don Padroncini, the infamous candy smuggler, has been sighted again. This time he is smuggling lumberjack equipment and defective gumball machines to the Copyrighted universe. The Intergalactic Authority on Everything sent Space Rabbits to stop him, but they fell into his trap. Or did they?FEATURES:‚Ä¢ No auto run ‚Ä¢ No virtual joysticks‚Ä¢ Precise and highly responsive controls done in a new and natural way. ‚Ä¢ Advanced movement techniques such as strafe jumping, wall sliding and ninja rope.‚Ä¢ Play against your friends, region or the whole universe.‚Ä¢ Watch replays of top 10 players on every level.‚Ä¢ 40+ unique, fun and hand crafted levels.‚Ä¢ Quirky outfits such as: Squatting Rabbits in Tracksuits, Disco Unicorn, Ninj0r and Little Red Rabbit Hood.
descriptionHTML:
Space Rabbits in Space is an award winning, fully-fledged 2d platformer designed specifically for touch screens. No autorun and no virtual joysticks. Precise and highly responsive controls.

Meet the Space Rabbits. Cute, fluffy bunnies from Space obsessed with speed and candies. Play with them through an adventure about betrayal, hard love and fun facts.

With our new tap-based control system, you can move more freely, more precisely and faster than ever before - even faster than classic hardware controllers. It’s intuitive and easy to learn, hard to master... you know the drill.

Play at your own pace or race against your friends or even the whole universe. It’s up to you.

Don Padroncini, the infamous candy smuggler, has been sighted again. This time he is smuggling lumberjack equipment and defective gumball machines to the Copyrighted universe. The Intergalactic Authority on Everything sent Space Rabbits to stop him, but they fell into his trap. Or did they?

FEATURES:
• No auto run
• No virtual joysticks
• Precise and highly responsive controls done in a new and natural way.
• Advanced movement techniques such as strafe jumping, wall sliding and ninja rope.
• Play against your friends, region or the whole universe.
• Watch replays of top 10 players on every level.
• 40+ unique, fun and hand crafted levels.
• Quirky outfits such as: Squatting Rabbits in Tracksuits, Disco Unicorn, Ninj0r and Little Red Rabbit Hood.

description: From the creators of the number 1 hit Lep's World ‚Äì over 175 million downloads!nerByte presents the long-awaited successor of Lep's World with more Levels, more Items, more enemies, better game physics, awesome graphics and beautiful new sound effects. Thanks for all your feedback! We took the best ideas and packed them into Lep's World 2, and the result is an incredibly good and addictive game.It is a beautiful sunny day in Leprechaun Village. Lep and his friends enjoy the sun, when suddenly the sky darkens and lightning fills the sky. An evil wizard appears, he steals the Leprechaun's gold, and kidnaps all the villagers except Lep, who luckily escapes. The wizard is planning to use the Leprechaun's magic and combine it with his own to take over the world.Lep has to save his friends and family all alone. So help him to gain more powerful abilities to defeat the wizard. Jump and run through Lep's world and have fun with 80 awesome well-designed levels.Note: Get more abilities after each World.FEATURES:+ Beautiful new graphics with more detail+ 10 unique Worlds with 90 Levels+ 10 items and abilities + 13 demanding enemies+ Challenging boss fightsJoin us on the Lep's World 2 Facebook Page:http://bit.ly/LepsWorldFBFollow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/LepsWorldFor more informations visit Lep's World 2 homepage:http://www.lepsworld2.comWe hope you enjoy the game.Have fun!! :)

description: Hugo, the worlds most famous troll, is back on track! Be warned - very addictive!Following the success of Hugo Retro Mania - Hugo is back and ready for the ride of his life.Relive the original and hugely popular Hugo train game, which was broadcast in the nineties across the world and watched by more than 400 million per week! This time with fantastic 3D graphics, expanded gameplay and tons of new and exciting features.Join Hugo as he mounts his trolley while his arch-enemy, the evil witch Scylla and her henchmen, breathe down his neck.Great reflexes and a quick mind are your weapons to overcome hurdles, oncoming trains and evil enemies.- Classic Hugo train dodging game - and a whole lot more- Jump, dodge and tilt to avoid obstacles and oncoming trains- Escape the evil witch Scylla and her henchmen, Don Croco and Mexi Croco- Master the swipe and tilt controls to perfection- Collect tons of gold- Stay on track and get rewarded with huge scores and life-changing achievements- Beautiful 3D graphics- Wheel of Fortune bonus game- Seamless Game Center interaction - see how far your friends made it, and beat them!- Six permanent upgrades and lots of shop items available - Trolley workshop - pimp your own trolley from parts you unlock- 10 challenging achievementsCome on and join Hugo on the most addictive chase ever on the App Store!
descriptionHTML:
Hugo, the worlds most famous troll, is back on track! Be warned - very addictive!

Following the success of Hugo Retro Mania - Hugo is back and ready for the ride of his life.

Relive the original and hugely popular Hugo train game, which was broadcast in the nineties across the world and watched by more than 400 million per week! This time with fantastic 3D graphics, expanded gameplay and tons of new and exciting features.

Join Hugo as he mounts his trolley while his arch-enemy, the evil witch Scylla and her henchmen, breathe down his neck.

Great reflexes and a quick mind are your weapons to overcome hurdles, oncoming trains and evil enemies.

- Classic Hugo train dodging game - and a whole lot more
- Jump, dodge and tilt to avoid obstacles and oncoming trains
- Escape the evil witch Scylla and her henchmen, Don Croco and Mexi Croco
- Master the swipe and tilt controls to perfection
- Collect tons of gold
- Stay on track and get rewarded with huge scores and life-changing achievements
- Beautiful 3D graphics

- Seamless Game Center interaction - see how far your friends made it, and beat them!
- Six permanent upgrades and lots of shop items available
- Trolley workshop - pimp your own trolley from parts you unlock
- 10 challenging achievements


Come on and join Hugo on the most addictive chase ever on the App Store!

description: Moto Rider GO: Highway Traffic brings to you one of the most compelling and satisfying traffic dodging experience in the world!Features:- Choose from the fastest high-performance motorcycles!- Enjoy extreme 3D visuals!- Prove your skills in hardcore challenges!- Upgrade your speed, breaking level and add extra lives!- Select your favorite motorbike category: chopper, cross or superbike!- Make near traffic misses discovering 4 unique locations: Suburbs, Desert, Snow and Night City- Explore 4 unique locations in 4 different modes!- Ride your motorcycle on a highway, interstate, or the autobahn!- Dominate online leaderboards!- Unlock 23 achievements!- Discover plenty of bike tuning options!ENDLESS GAMEPLAYHead out and race as fast as you can to become the best new moto rider in the world! Race the traffic and complete the challenges to get real among the competition. Jump on your racing bike and ride in the endless busy roads and highways! Make near traffic misses discovering 4 unique locations: Suburbs, Desert, Snow and Night City in 4 different modes! Ride your motorcycle on a highway, interstate, or the autobahn. Never forget that riding a motorcycle can be fun, but it can also be dangerous! Roads and highways are full of speeding cars ‚Äì they can bother you!SELECTION OF HIGH-PERFORMANCE MOTORBIKESHave you ever wanted to ride a motorcycle in real life? Great! It's about time to test your skills and decide on the motorcycle category you would choose ‚Äì extremely fast superbike, epic chopper motorcycles or modified high-performance versions of off-road motorcycles! Every bike has its own individual extras: total lives, near miss bonus, high-speed bonus or wrong way bonus.A TON OF TUNING AND CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONSGo to the garage and select one of the high-performance motorbikes. Tune your vehicle and customize its appearance. Choose your favorite body color and slap on some well-designed decals! Give your rides your own style. Increase your motorbike's speed, breaking level and add extra lives ‚Äì these will all have a definite impact on your bike's performance.CLIMB TO THE TOP OF THE LEADERBOARDSTake part in a selection of hardcore challenges and become the fastest moto rider on the streets. Millions of other players will compete for the top rank. Join them and work your way up the weekly leaderboards rankings. Race the traffic and complete the challenges to get real among the competition. Nobody said that traffic driving would be easy - but the prize is well worth it.RICH ROAD ENVIRONMENTSGO Moto Rider: Highway Traffic is setting the new standard within traffic racing genre. Enjoy extremely impressive graphics and experience high-octane racing! Discover well-designed and full animated dash and speedometer! It will be fun and compelling, we guarantee!Prove your skills as tenacious bike rider! Download Moto Rider GO: Highway Traffic now!Finally available on Google Play for FREE!Discover our other games: http://t-bull.com/#gamesLike us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/tbullgamesFollow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tbullgames
descriptionHTML:
Moto Rider GO: Highway Traffic brings to you one of the most compelling and satisfying traffic dodging experience in the world!

Features:
- Choose from the fastest high-performance motorcycles!
- Enjoy extreme 3D visuals!
- Prove your skills in hardcore challenges!
- Upgrade your speed, breaking level and add extra lives!
- Select your favorite motorbike category: chopper, cross or superbike!
- Make near traffic misses discovering 4 unique locations: Suburbs, Desert, Snow and Night City
- Explore 4 unique locations in 4 different modes!
- Ride your motorcycle on a highway, interstate, or the autobahn!
- Dominate online leaderboards!
- Unlock 23 achievements!
- Discover plenty of bike tuning options!

ENDLESS GAMEPLAY
Head out and race as fast as you can to become the best new moto rider in the world! Race the traffic and complete the challenges to get real among the competition. Jump on your racing bike and ride in the endless busy roads and highways! Make near traffic misses discovering 4 unique locations: Suburbs, Desert, Snow and Night City in 4 different modes! Ride your motorcycle on a highway, interstate, or the autobahn. Never forget that riding a motorcycle can be fun, but it can also be dangerous! Roads and highways are full of speeding cars – they can bother you!

SELECTION OF HIGH-PERFORMANCE MOTORBIKES
Have you ever wanted to ride a motorcycle in real life? Great! It's about time to test your skills and decide on the motorcycle category you would choose – extremely fast superbike, epic chopper motorcycles or modified high-performance versions of off-road motorcycles! Every bike has its own individual extras: total lives, near miss bonus, high-speed bonus or wrong way bonus.

A TON OF TUNING AND CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS
Go to the garage and select one of the high-performance motorbikes. Tune your vehicle and customize its appearance. Choose your favorite body color and slap on some well-designed decals! Give your rides your own style. Increase your motorbike's speed, breaking level and add extra lives – these will all have a definite impact on your bike's performance.

CLIMB TO THE TOP OF THE LEADERBOARDS
Take part in a selection of hardcore challenges and become the fastest moto rider on the streets. Millions of other players will compete for the top rank. Join them and work your way up the weekly leaderboards rankings. Race the traffic and complete the challenges to get real among the competition. Nobody said that traffic driving would be easy - but the prize is well worth it.

RICH ROAD ENVIRONMENTS
GO Moto Rider: Highway Traffic is setting the new standard within traffic racing genre. Enjoy extremely impressive graphics and experience high-octane racing! Discover well-designed and full animated dash and speedometer! It will be fun and compelling, we guarantee!

Prove your skills as tenacious bike rider! Download Moto Rider GO: Highway Traffic now!
Finally available on Google Play for FREE!

Discover our other games: http://t-bull.com/#games
Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/tbullgames
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tbullgames
