comments: We just spent the last few hours playing these games as a family. It was so much fun.  The kids did not wanna stop playing.    Edit:  After a week or so we are still enjoying AirConsole. It can be hard to get three teenagers to sit and enjoy family time, but this works everytime.  I really recommend this one!

Had fun with my brothers after a long time. The games are simple (like those old 8 bit games) and funny. More games are expected. Devs should consider implementing some of the open source free games to make it more engaging. The free version is heavily limited where you'll be locked out for 30 seconds and 5 minutes for every 5mins and 30 mins respectively. In addition, only 2 players can join in the free version. It should be atleast 3 people for a real multi-player (as against dual-player), with ad supported. Premium is very inexpensive, though.

Originally had it at 5 stars. Now has wayy to many ads. Every 30 min makes you take a 5 min break (unless you buy the premium version or whatever). It does have SOME fun games to play with friends....  But It now makes you buy the Super version to play with more than 2 people. So if you want to play with more that 1 friend you have to pay for it. Dont get it

Amazing!!! Being able to play games  on the go is exactly what you need!! A nintendo switch is useless if you have this! Me and my cousins really enjoyed this. However, the only thing I would really want is to view the game on your phone or device instead of on a TV or other things as if everyone who is playing has a nintendo switch and can see their character or whatever on it.   Thanks for reading I hope my idea will be implemented

descriptionHTML:
Pet Rescue Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and save the pets from the evil Pet Snatchers! Moves are limited so plan them carefully. Your puzzle skills will be tested with hours of block busting fun!

Take on this puzzling Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! 

Pet Rescue Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Pet Rescue Saga features:
• Eye-catching graphics and colorful gameplay 
• Lovable pets of all varieties, puppies, bunnies, piglets and many more! 
• Diamonds, exploding bombs, colorful paint pots, locked animal cages and much more 
• Spectacular boosters and bonus rewards unlocked after many levels 
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
• Hundreds of pet puzzling levels - more added every 2 weeks!
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

Already a fan of Pet Rescue Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: 
facebook.com/PetRescueSaga 
twitter.com/PetRescueSaga 

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Pet Rescue Saga!

comments: Amazing game. Me and my friend spend hours on it. I get to shows him my mods. He has none though we both have completed the levels. The game NEVER AND I REPEAT NEVER gets boring. Definitely better than the angry birds series must download. The only problome is the metal flap things don't work correctly. They just float in midair.Apart from that  Please make a new selection of levels. My life depends on it!!!!

Generally great, but destroyed by graphics/world modeling glitches that render levels impossible to complete! Generally involving trap doors that aren't in the right place. Frustrating. AND the new cake race won't unlock rewards- 24000 hrs to go apparently so I can't play more levels.

I don't  understand why people complain about ads and call Rovio money hungry. If may be a "free" game but really nothing is completely free. Developers deserve to get paid. It costs to have a game. Free games have ads just like TV. And you don't have to make the in-app purchase. GO buy a game.

I would give it a higher rating, but on those levels like 6-18. The button activated doors and platforms don't work right and they glitch out. I've been able to get through a few levels without the doors but on 6-18 you can't complete the level without this door working. Please get this fixed

Very disappointed that I've had no response to my email and that there is no sign of a fix to the bug with El Porkado, rendering the levels uncompletable. Wouldn't be so bad if you didn't have some of my actual money!

The game is really good but the bridge bug is annoying. I got stuck on a level and tried to reinstall the app but it did not work. It is so annoying that a really good game like this has a bug that prevents you from finishing the game. Oh and also, what is different about the HD version? It seems to be the exacted same.

descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!

IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!

"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku

“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN

“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play

"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGR

Create the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!

With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!

Features:
● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!
● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!
● Free updates!
● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!
● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...
● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!

Mechanic Pig
● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!
● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!
● All you have to do is pilot it!
● Tweak his design to get all three stars!

New Episode: The Road to El Porkado
Embark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!

Get ready to see pigs fly!

Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/badpiggies

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/badpiggies

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy


Important Message for Parents

- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

description: Your name is Bobby and you're stuck in your dreams. Dreams about beast fights with gangs. Although the fights is beast, but it involve flat humans.You have strange dreams about how human from gangs fall from a great height to a flat floor.To get rid of these dreams you have to take part in beast fighting without rules with other gangs and flat human. Be smart and use the environment in your favor.Drop plasticine human from a great height onto a flat floor. But do not be afraid, you will not harm them. After all, these thick funny and clumsy little humans are made of clay. They do not hurt at all.Therefore, use the boldest decisions to win in these beast battles without rules. Remember that physics is your assistant. Win in battles without rules wrestling, to get rid of these ridiculous dreams about the fall of human on a flat floor.
descriptionHTML:
Your name is Bobby and you're stuck in your dreams. Dreams about beast fights with gangs. Although the fights is beast, but it involve flat humans.
You have strange dreams about how human from gangs fall from a great height to a flat floor.
To get rid of these dreams you have to take part in beast fighting without rules with other gangs and flat human. Be smart and use the environment in your favor.
Drop plasticine human from a great height onto a flat floor. But do not be afraid, you will not harm them. After all, these thick funny and clumsy little humans are made of clay. They do not hurt at all.
Therefore, use the boldest decisions to win in these beast battles without rules. Remember that physics is your assistant. Win in battles without rules wrestling, to get rid of these ridiculous dreams about the fall of human on a flat floor.

comments: Love the concept, but it doesn't work at ALL. I downloaded it, and no matter what I do, nor how absolutely silent it is, the chicken is running and jumping and I have zero control over it. Super disappointed--hopefully it's just glitching?? I wanted to try it, but neither sound nor silence give me any control over it üò£

Ads are frequent and long. The audio sensitivity is difficult to judge. There is no mute button for the game's audio and the sounds interfere with the movements. When I jump, he lands and jumps a second time from the sound of the landing or a coin. Have to turn the media on my phone all the way down to fix it.  Add game sound settings or make the music and movements not register for the chicken. Shorten the ads. And maybe change the visuals to be a little less "flappy bird"-like.

People complain about the ads but 2 dollars is all you need to remove them. Cheap and it supports this fun game. If your game audio is interrupting the jumping then plug in some ear buds, it's that easy people!

It's a great game, hilarious concept, only thing I have issues with is that the noises for picking up the coins pick up as sound. Frustrating when you are trying to be careful and it dings and sends the chicken into a mine... Maybe make them doubtless so they don't get picked up by mic.

Good game but enough with the ads. Way too many and way too long. The ads are longer than the game play. Ine ad was over 30 seconds long. You guys obviously do not read these comments or reply to any of them. This could be a great game.

Way too many adds. The adds block the sensitivity, so I cant adjust that, so I have to scream as hard I can for a jump. Then a 30 sec minimum add almost every retry. No thanks. Could be entertaining though

comments: My only issue with this game is that u almost have to end up purchasing tix to continue to play. The further u move on in the game, the more tix each card costs & ur only given a certain amount thru a daily reward. App should provide ways to earn more tix, either thru a daily spin or higher rewards. *(since app developer replied to this review, I changed my review to 4 stars)

Really liked this game. Now i cant play it because its near impossible to get more tickets. I cant complete daily tasks as I have no tickets and ive got to wait ages to get daily tickets. Even then there gone within 5-10minutes and cant get no more until following day. Games dont pay out enough either when you win

Just played my first 4-5 rounds and this ROCKS! Not too fast. I love it! Fair Payouts but 1st, 2nd, etc same as others. Graphics work!  All Around impression... Awesome-ness. Update: I've been here atleast  5mos... long enough to know this still ROCKS!

I really like this Bingo  game.  A few upgrades and it will  be better than all the other Bingo games.  I love the amount of tickets it gives you to play.  I love the extra stuff you can earn and not have to pay for.  A couple of things that would  make this game better would be all 4 cards on one screen in tablet mode, the power ups being applied automatically  and being able to daub that last number that's  called cause usually that's the one needed for Bingo.  Otherwise its great.  I hope  you find this useful.  I understand  if you can't  fix all three of these but the first 2 are more important  than the last and i understand  there can only be a certain amount of bingos i guess.  Thank you.  Real close to being a 5 but those 3 issues really hold me back as I'm  sure it does others as well.

I like this game VERY much. But my tickets keep disappearing! I just earned 200 tickets for feeding the dog. My tickets got added on. Then i clicked on Candy Crush. Then i clicked on 4 cards. And it said i didn't have enough tickets! It cost 240 in Candy Crush. I had almost 300 tick. When i looked at the top, i only had 131. What happened to all my tickets that quick?!?!? I'm about to uninstall now. Its not the FIRST time this happened. But it will be the last! #GoodbyeBingo

descriptionHTML:
With over 5 BILLION downloads and worldwide hits like My Talking Tom and My Talking Angela, Talking Tom and Friends now has a BRAND NEW free app. Introducing: My Talking Hank! Take care of Talking Hank, the cutest puppy out there. Hank needs your ❤️ ! He’s ready for adventure and off to explore the tropical islands of Hawaii, but HE NEEDS YOU to help him!

★ TAKE CARE OF YOUR PUPPY
Adopt your very own puppy, little cute baby Hank. He is one of a kind. A puppy so sweet you can’t look away! Take care of Hank, your new favorite virtual pet. Feed him delicious food, take him to the toilet and swing him to sleep on a hammock under a starry sky.

★ HELP HANK COLLECT ALL THE ANIMALS
Hank loves photography! He wants to take picture of every wild animal living on the island. And there are plenty of them to discover - from a fluffy White Bunny, to a silly Flamingo, gangster Hip Hop Hippo and many more. Travel through different zones of the island. Place toys and food for the animals. Wait for them to show up and… CLICK! ... collect their photos.

★ FUN BEYOND FUN
Talking Hank will not only repeat everything you say with a hilarious voice, Hank takes fun to the next level! Laugh out loud at his constant adventures, his toilet shenanigans and much, much more! If you enjoy tamagotchi-style apps and kitty collector game mechanics you will fall in love with My Talking Hank.

★ FEATURES
Welcome to Hawaii: Check out your wonderful island home! It looks cool night and day!
Raise Hank: Hank needs you to take care of him, from feeding to visiting the toilet!
Take Photos: Help Hank complete his photo album by taking pictures of wild, exotic animals.
Attract animals: Some of them are scared of Hank, you’ll need food and toys to lure them out!
Keep playing: There are more features to discover in My Talking Hank, so keep exploring!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (level progress, in-game functionalities)
